title: Shopify Product Lister for Google Stores – WELLBALANCE SL
description:
As WELLBALANCE SL continues to scale and launch new Shopify stores across multiple markets, we are looking for a highly structured and detail-oriented Product Importer to support our expansion.



This role is critical to our operational growth. You will be responsible for importing products efficiently, building structured and conversion-ready product pages, and ensuring full backend accuracy across all stores. Precision, speed, and consistency are essential.



Your work directly impacts our ability to scale profitably and launch new products seamlessly.



Day in the Life of a Product Importer at WELLBALANCE SL

 • Import new products into multiple Shopify stores following internal SOPs and structured workflows

 • Ensure 100?curacy in product data: titles, descriptions, variants, pricing, inventory, shipping settings, and attributes

 • Build structured product pages aligned with brand positioning and compliance requirements

 • Optimize product content to support performance across paid traffic channels (Google & Meta)

 • Maintain clean backend structure across all listings (collections, tags, product types, variants)

 • Monitor inventory levels and coordinate with the Supply Chain team when restocking is required

 • Conduct regular quality control checks to ensure zero inconsistencies or errors

 • Follow predefined listing targets (daily/weekly volume goals) with consistent quality

 • Use tools such as Shopify, Kopy, Google Sheets, and internal tracking boards to manage workflow

 • Update internal reports related to imports, product status, and performance



We Would Love to Hear From You If…

 • You have at least 6 months of experience in e-commerce, specifically in dropshipping

 • You have solid experience working inside Shopify backend

 • You are comfortable using product import tools such as Kopy or similar systems

 • You are experienced with Excel or Google Sheets for reporting and data tracking

 • You have strong attention to detail and can work with high accuracy under volume

 • You are structured, proactive, and able to follow SOPs precisely

 • You understand the importance of compliance and backend consistency in scaling stores

 • Prior experience in a similar high-volume product listing role is required





200 products a week importing 



Role Details

 • Full-time or part-time position

 • Flexible hours

 • Remote position

 • Performance and structure-oriented environment

title: Experienced Airbnb Co-Host, needed. Must work U.S. West cost time
description:
Job Description: Need 2 Airbnb Co?Host (Guest Experience & Operations Coordinator)



Position Type: Part-time or Full-time (based on portfolio needs)

Schedule: 6:00 AM – 12:00 AM Las Vegas Time (Pacific Time), 2 Shifts, 9hours 6am-3pm, 3pm to 12am (Pacific Time)

Let us know which shift you prefer. 6 days a week. + Overtime pay if taking additional shifts or days.

Location: Remote (must reliably work the required Las Vegas-time hours)

Experience Level: Experienced (Airbnb co-hosting / short-term rental operations required)





About the Role



We’re looking for an experienced Airbnb Co?Host to manage day-to-day guest communication and operational coordination for our Airbnb listings. This role is ideal for someone who is highly organized, calm under pressure, and genuinely enjoys delivering excellent guest experiences—while also keeping operations running smoothly behind the scenes.



You’ll be responsible for guest messaging, calendar management, stay optimization, and coordinating cleaning and maintenance to ensure our properties stay guest-ready and consistently earn strong reviews.





Key Responsibilities

Guest Communication & Customer Service



Respond to guest inquiries and messages promptly and professionally in clear, fluent English



Provide detailed pre-arrival instructions, check-in guidance, house rule reminders, and local recommendations



Handle guest issues and complaints with empathy and efficiency, aiming to resolve concerns quickly



Manage cancellations, refunds, alterations, and disputes (when needed) using Airbnb best practices



Calendar Management & Stay Optimization



Maintain and manage the Airbnb Calendar with accuracy across all listings



Optimize stays and vacancies by:



Monitoring occupancy gaps and adjusting availability strategically



Coordinating turnarounds to enable back-to-back bookings when possible



Applying minimum stays, gap-night strategies, and booking rules to reduce vacancy



Ensure reservation details, check-in/check-out timing, and special requests are tracked and communicated



Cleaning & Turnover Coordination



Schedule and coordinate cleaning staff for turnovers and deep cleans



Ensure cleaners have:



Accurate arrival/departure timing



Access instructions and job expectations



A clear checklist and photo verification (as required)



Confirm completion and readiness prior to guest arrival



Maintenance Coordination & Issue Resolution



Coordinate maintenance staff/vendors for repairs, preventative maintenance, and emergency issues



Triage incoming issues (HVAC, plumbing, locks, internet, appliances, etc.) and dispatch the right resource fast



Track maintenance requests to completion and confirm quality of work



Communicate updates to guests as needed while protecting the guest experience



Operational Excellence & Reporting



Maintain organized records of incidents, repairs, vendor notes, and recurring issues



Identify recurring problems and recommend process improvements



Support listing performance by flagging opportunities (guest feedback trends, amenity upgrades, operational gaps)







Required Qualifications



Proven experience as an Airbnb Co?Host, short-term rental VA, or property management operator (experience is required)



Strong working knowledge of:



Airbnb Inbox



Airbnb Calendar



Reservation modifications and day-to-day hosting tools



Excellent written and spoken English (must be able to communicate professionally with guests)



Demonstrated customer service excellence (conflict resolution, empathy, professionalism)



Proven ability to coordinate cleaning and maintenance teams and manage time-sensitive turnovers



Highly organized, detail-oriented, and able to manage multiple tasks without dropping the ball



Reliable high-speed internet and consistent availability during 9am–7pm Las Vegas time



Preferred (Nice-to-Have) Skills



Experience managing multiple listings/properties at once



Familiarity with pricing/optimization tools (e.g., PriceLabs, Beyond, Wheelhouse) or dynamic pricing strategies



Experience with SOPs, checklists, quality control photos, and vendor performance tracking



Familiarity with PMS tools (e.g., Hostaway, Guesty, Hospitable) if applicable



Hospitality mindset and a proactive “problem-solver” attitude







What Success Looks Like



Guests receive prompt, professional responses and feel well-supported



Calendars are accurate, turnarounds are smooth, and vacancy gaps are minimized



Cleanings and maintenance are well-coordinated with minimal last-minute issues



Strong guest reviews and reduced operational fires through proactive management







How to Apply (You Can Copy/Paste This Into Your Posting)



Please include:



A brief summary of your Airbnb co-hosting / STR experience



Number of listings/doors you’ve supported and what you were responsible for



Tools you’ve used (Airbnb Calendar, PMS, pricing tools, messaging tools, etc.)



Your availability confirming 9am–7pm Las Vegas time



A short writing sample: respond to a guest who says, “The AC isn’t working and it’s really hot.”

title: Facebook Ads Creative Strategist (AI & UGC Focused)
description:
We are an Australian eCommerce brand looking for a
 Ads Creative Specialist to create high-converting video and image ads.



This is a performance-focused role.

We care about results — not just design.



What You’ll Do

- Create 3–5
 video ads per week (15–45 sec)

- Create high-converting image ads

- Generate high-quality product images and UGC-style AI images using tools like Ideogram, Google Gemini or similar

- Use platforms like Creatify (or similar AI UGC tools) to create high-quality AI-generated UGC product videos for
 ads

- Write strong hooks and ad angles

- Turn product benefits into emotional selling points

- Repurpose winning creatives into new variations

- Follow Meta ad compliance guidelines



Requirements

- 1–2+ years experience creating
 ads for eCommerce

- Proven track record of ads that converted

- Highly experienced in AI tools and generating realistic UGC-style video and image content

- Experience using platforms like Creatify, Ideogram, Google Gemini or similar

- Strong understanding of direct response marketing

- Skilled in CapCut, Premiere Pro, Canva or similar

- Good English communication

- Fast turnaround



MUST Include With Application:

- Start your application with: CONVERT



Then send:

- Portfolio (video + image ads)

- Screenshots of results (ROAS, CPA, CTR, conversions)

- Rate per video/image

- Your availability



Applications without proof of results will not be reviewed.



We are hiring immediately for long-term work.



Performance bonuses available for winning creatives.

title: Marketing Specialist
description:
# Part-Time Marketing Specialist (GoHighLevel Expert) – Long-Term Role



**Location:** Remote (Philippines)

**Schedule:** Part-Time (20-30 hours/week) – U.S. business hours (PST preferred overlap)

**Pay:** $800–$1,200/month depending on experience



---



## About Us



We are a growing U.S.-based tax and CFO advisory firm serving business owners. We focus on high-level tax strategy and financial advisory — not just tax preparation. Our marketing is a major growth channel, and we’re looking for a strong, reliable marketing professional to help us scale long-term.



We are not looking for someone who needs constant direction. We are looking for someone who can execute, solve problems, and improve systems.



---



## Who This Role Is For



You are:



* Highly experienced with **GoHighLevel (GHL)**

* Strong in written English that sounds natural and American

* Organized and detail-oriented

* A self-starter who figures things out

* Comfortable troubleshooting tech issues

* Looking for a long-term, stable position



If you need daily hand-holding or constant instructions, this will not be a good fit.



---



## Core Responsibilities



### GoHighLevel (GHL) Management



* Build and optimize funnels

* Create and manage workflows and automations

* Manage pipelines, tagging, triggers, and CRM structure

* Troubleshoot integration and automation issues

* Improve system efficiency and performance



### Marketing Execution



* Build and send
 campaigns

* Write marketing
s and nurture sequences

* Create and schedule social media content

* Publish blog posts and website updates

* Assist with webinar and event marketing

* Track KPIs and performance metrics



---



## Requirements



* 3+ years of digital marketing experience

* Strong hands-on experience with GoHighLevel

* Excellent written English (must read like an American writer)

* Strong problem-solving ability

* Reliable internet (minimum 50 Mbps)

* Quiet work environment

* Ability to work consistently during U.S. business hours



---



## Bonus (Not Required)



* Experience with U.S. accounting, tax, or financial services firms

* Paid ads experience

* Funnel conversion optimization

* Experience using AI tools for marketing

* Experience using ClickUp



---



## What We Offer



* Stable, long-term position

* Consistent pay twice per month

* Performance-based raises

* Direct communication with leadership



---



## How to Apply



To be considered, please:



1. Put the word **SYSTEMS** in the first line of your application.

2. Send your resume.

3. Record a 2–3 minute Loom video explaining your experience with GoHighLevel and what you’ve built.

4. Include links or screenshots of funnels/workflows you’ve created.

5. Provide one writing sample 
 or sales page).



Applications that do not follow these instructions will not be considered.



---



We are looking for a long-term team member who wants to grow with us. If that’s you, apply now.

title: Virtual Assistant — Android App QA & Monitoring (Long-term) (No Experience Needed)
description:
Looking for 500+ Android users to help test and monitor a background Android app across different phone and tablet brands/models.



Already applied to this Android tester role before? Please don’t re-apply — we’ll contact you if you’re a fit.



This is very simple: install the app from the Google Play Store, keep it running, and follow short testing/verification steps when requested.



What you do (simple):

- Install the app (Google Play Store)

- Keep it running in the background

- Phone stays connected to the internet (20-24h/day)

- Occasionally complete short check-in/testing steps (to confirm stability + uptime)



Why it’s a good fit:

- No calls, no meetings

- Works alongside any VA/freelance job

- Setup once ? keep running long-term

- Great for anyone who wants a low-effort side gig



Requirements:

- Android device (phone or tablet)

- Stable internet

- Phone online most of the day (target: 20–24h/day uptime)

- Reliable/consistent (uptime matters)



? Please do NOT apply if:

- Your phone is only online a few hours/day

- You use airplane mode at night / regularly disconnect

- You only use iPhone/iPad



? If you can keep your phone online 20–24h/day consistently, you’ll do well here.



How to apply:

One application per person. If you’ve applied before, no need to submit again.





Fill out this short form (takes 2 minutes): 
 



If you qualify, I’ll send setup instructions and your access code.

title: AI Visual Content & Social Media Manager
description:
We are seeking a highly creative and technically skilled Midjourney AI Imagery & Social Media Manager to lead the development of visually consistent AI-generated characters and manage our growing social media presence. The ideal candidate is an expert in Midjourney with a strong eye for character consistency, storytelling, and visual branding—especially for children’s content.



This role requires a fast learner who is innovative, detail-oriented, and capable of producing engaging, child-friendly visuals while also building and scaling social media accounts through strategic content creation and audience engagement.



The successful candidate will understand child psychology and be able to create imagery and social media content that resonates with young audiences and parents alike. If one person can manage both AI imagery creation and social media growth at a high level, that is strongly preferred.



Key Responsibilities

Midjourney AI Imagery & Creative Development



Create high-quality, consistent AI-generated characters using Midjourney for children’s books and related content

Maintain strict character consistency across multiple scenes, poses, and storytelling formats

Develop creative prompts, workflows, and visual styles aligned with brand guidelines

Conceptualize child-friendly visuals that are engaging, expressive, and age-appropriate

Collaborate with writers and creative teams to bring story concepts to life through imagery

Continuously refine prompts and techniques to improve quality, speed, and visual cohesion

Stay up to date with Midjourney updates, AI art trends, and best practices

Social Media Management & Growth



Develop and execute a strategic social media plan to grow brand presence and audience engagement

Create high-performing posts, reels, and visual content tailored to each platform (Instagram, TikTok,
, etc.)

Build and scale social media accounts organically with proven growth strategies

Maintain a consistent posting schedule with engaging, creative, and on-brand content

Analyze performance metrics and optimize content based on insights and trends

Engage with followers, respond to comments/messages, and foster community growth

Identify trends and viral opportunities to increase reach and brand awareness



Benefits:**

Job Security and Stability

title: Philippines-Based Bookkeeper (Short-Term Rental / Airbnb Specialist)
description:
We are looking for an experienced Bookkeeper based in the Philippines with proven expertise in Airbnb property management accounting and Hostaway.



This is a specialist role focused strictly on bookkeeping and financial reconciliation.



Role Overview

The successful candidate will:

Review and reconcile monthly income and expenditure

Cross-check all receipts against Airbnb payout statements and Hostaway reports

Ensure financial records are accurate and complete

Identify discrepancies and provide clear reporting

Prepare end-of-month summaries

This role will be paid at a flat monthly rate for end-of-month financial reconciliation.



Requirements



Strong background in accounting and bookkeeping

Experience working with Airbnb financial reports

Familiarity with Hostaway

Experience reconciling payouts, fees, commissions, and expenses

High attention to detail

Able to work independently and deliver accurate monthly reports



For application, please answer the following questions below:



We’d just like to ask a few follow-up questions:

Approximately how many properties did you manage in your previous property management role?

What did your day-to-day responsibilities typically involve?

Have you had any experience using Hostaway? If so, could you briefly describe how you’ve used it?

What finance-related tasks did you handle within Hostaway? Could you please elaborate on this?

How do you reconcile Airbnb payouts with actual bank deposits?

How do you account for Airbnb service fees, refunds, and cleaning fees in your records?

Can you briefly walk us through your month-end reconciliation process for short-term rentals?

Have you worked with Stripe or other payment processors for reconciling transactions?





Important



Please only apply if you have direct experience in accounting and bookkeeping within the short-term rental industry and HOSTAWAY & AIRBNB. This is a specialist role and requires prior experience. 



Send your cv to

title: Bookkeeper (for UK accounting firm)
description:
Role: Bookkeeper (UK-based clients)





Essential Attributes

- At least 5 years of UK bookkeeping experience

- Minimum of 3 years’ experience using Xero and Hubdoc

- Strong understanding of VAT

- Excellent written and verbal communication skills

- Strong time management skills and ability to meet deadlines

- Highly organised with excellent attention to detail

- Proven ability to work independently in a remote environment

- Reliable internet connection and suitable home office setup



To be considered for the role, you MUST SUBMIT:

- A personalised message which details your years of experience and the size of your current portfolio. Please also detail if you have worked for an accounting firm before, or if your experience is focused on one main business.

- A video introducing yourself

- Your availability for an interview over the next 7 days



AND



Use the following title/subject when you submit your application: [Your name] | Bookkeeper Application



---



Summary



MyEasyAccounts is a rapidly growing accountancy firm established in 2022. Co-owned by Josh and Patrick, the firm is seeking a proactive and detail-oriented bookkeeper to join the team and grow with the business.



You will be responsible for managing the bookkeeping for a portfolio of UK-based clients Airbnb and short-term rental management companies, which operate an agency-style model involving client money and multi-property reporting.



You will work closely with and report directly to, the UK-based team. Please note that this role is not client-facing.



The ideal candidate will be an excellent communicator with strong technical bookkeeping knowledge, particularly around VAT, client money, and accurate cost allocation.



Key Responsibilities

- General bookkeeping duties

- Take full responsibility for managing bookkeeping for a portfolio of clients

- Maintain accurate and timely accounting records

- Review your own work and collaborate with colleagues where required

- Report key financial information to management

- Support ad hoc financial reporting projects

- Airbnb and property management clients

- Correctly post and reconcile Airbnb payouts

- Understand and apply agent versus principal accounting

- Record management fees as revenue and owners’ balances as client money liabilities

- Maintain and reconcile client money accounts

- Produce monthly owner statements where required

- Allocate income and costs by individual property using tracking categories or equivalent

- Allocate shared or bulk costs, such as software or supplies, consistently across properties

- VAT and compliance

- Prepare and review VAT returns

- Apply correct VAT treatment to management fees

- Apply reverse charge VAT correctly on Airbnb service fees

- Ensure correct VAT coding for cleaning, maintenance, and software costs

- Software and systems

- Confident daily use of Xero



Advanced use of Hubdoc, including:

- Processing high volumes of invoices and receipts

- Applying correct VAT codes

- Assigning tracking categories or properties at point of entry

- Reconcile PMS data to accounting records and bank transactions

- Additional responsibilities (preferred but not essential)

- Initial preparation of monthly payroll journals

- Initial preparation of basic annual accounts

- Initial preparation and submission of self-assessment tax returns

- Preparation and submission of confirmation statements

title: Lead video editor for NBA basketball player content
description:
Video Editor: Personal Basketball Brand (20 Videos/Mo) – Hormozi/Zimbelman Style



Description:

I am looking for a long-term video editor to help scale TrainSolo, a basketball training system. We need 20 high-impact short-form videos per month (TikTok/Reels).



The Aesthetic:

I need a specific blend of two styles:



The Message: High-authority, logic-driven "Hard Truths" (Inspired by Alex Hormozi and Brannon Zimbelman).



The Look: Personal, raw, and athletic (Inspired 
 
 as well as informational 
 



Personal & Raw: It must feel like a personal video from me, not just a polished commercial. Keep gym sounds (swishes/squeaks) audible at times.



Aggressive Pacing: Use "J-cuts" to remove all dead air and breaths.



Bold Captions: Fast-paced, high-contrast text that highlights key hooks.



Technical Overlays: Use lines, circles, or timers to highlight basketball footwork/mechanics.



Turnaround: 24-48 hours per video.



Rate: $500 per month for 20 videos.



To Apply: Send a portfolio showing you can do sports editing AND business-style captions. Do not send a generic resume. Use the word "UNGUARDABLE" in your application so I know you read this.

title: Ad & Creative Designer (Graphics + AI Performance)
description:
Join Our Team at 7 Figure Dojo!



We’re looking for a Graphic Designer with a performance mindset and strong AI fluency — someone who can produce scroll-stopping ad creatives at scale while leveraging AI tools to accelerate production, testing, and optimization.



This role is hands-on in ad creative production first, with a focus on conversion-driven performance design and AI-assisted workflow systems to ensure client campaigns not only look great but perform at a high level.



You should be comfortable combining design fundamentals, marketing psychology, performance data, and AI tools to increase creative velocity and improve CTR, CVR, and CPL.





Key Responsibilities:



I. Ad & Social Graphics (Primary)

* Design high-converting static and lightweight motion graphics for paid social (Meta, TikTok), display, and organic channels.

* Use AI tools (e.g., Midjourney, DALL·E, Firefly, Runway, Canva AI, ChatGPT, etc.) to:

- Generate concepts, visual variations, and creative hooks

- Accelerate asset production

- Enhance images and backgrounds

- Produce rapid creative testing variants

* Create multiple creative variations (hooks, headlines, layouts, colorways, formats) to support structured A/B testing.

* Adapt designs to multiple aspect ratios (1:1, 4:5, 9:16, 16:9) and platform specifications.

* Collaborate closely with Media Buyers to align creatives with offers, audiences, messaging angles, and KPI goals.

* Iterate rapidly based on performance data and testing insights.



II. AI-Driven Creative Systems

* Build repeatable AI-assisted creative workflows to increase output without sacrificing quality.

* Develop prompt systems and AI templates to generate scalable ad variations.

* Combine AI-generated assets with professional design refinement for polished, brand-aligned outputs.

* Use AI tools to speed up copy ideation and creative angle development (in collaboration with the marketing team).

* Stay current with emerging AI design tools and recommend improvements to internal workflows.



III. Brand & Visual Systems

* Apply or create lightweight brand kits (color systems, typography, layout frameworks) for consistent performance campaigns.

* Retouch, cut out, enhance, and AI-augment client photos with overlays, messaging frames, and ad-ready treatments.

* Prepare modular, editable ad templates for rapid iteration and scaling.

* Ensure AI-generated content remains brand-safe, compliant, and visually cohesive.



IV. Collaboration & Workflow

* Work from briefs, moodboards, and references — while proactively proposing AI-assisted, test-driven creative angles.

* Maintain organized design systems, prompt libraries, version control, and asset repositories.

* Collaborate cross-functionally with Media Buyers and Copywriters.

* Translate performance data into new creative hypotheses and creative refresh strategies.



V. Quality Control

* Proof for accuracy (copy, pricing, disclaimers, dates, logos).

* Ensure accessibility standards (contrast, readability, hierarchy).

* Confirm all exports meet platform requirements (dimensions, file size, format).

* Review AI-generated outputs for visual integrity and brand alignment.

* Revision Expectations

- Designs should require no more than 2 structured revision rounds when briefed correctly.

- Creative submissions must reflect thoughtful interpretation of the brief, performance intent, and brand standards.



VI. Continuous Improvement

* Stay ahead of trends in:

- Paid social creative

- Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) in ad creative

- AI-assisted design workflows

* Regularly review campaign data with Media Buyers and generate new test angles.

* Propose new AI tools or automation systems to improve output and performance.



VI. Performance Indicators

* Creative Velocity: Consistently meets or exceeds weekly creative production quotas.

* Performance Lift: Designs contribute to measurable improvements in CTR, CVR, CPL, and ROAS.

* Testing Discipline: Delivers multiple structured variations per brief and tracks results.

* AI Leverage: Demonstrates efficient use of AI tools to increase output and iteration speed.

* Brand Alignment: Campaign assets reflect brand guidelines with minimal rework.

* Operational Hygiene: Clean file organization, prompt libraries, naming conventions, and structured handoffs.





Portfolio Requirements (Mandatory)



To be considered for this role, applicants must submit a portfolio that clearly demonstrates performance-driven design experience.



Your portfolio must include:

* Paid social ad creatives (Meta, Instagram, TikTok, etc.).

* Examples of multiple creative variations for the same offer (hooks, formats, colorways, angles).

* Performance metrics when available (CTR, CPL, CVR, ROAS, etc.).

* Before/after examples or A/B test comparisons (if applicable).

* Landing pages or funnel designs (if available).





Qualifications

* 1-2 years of experience in graphic design for paid social (Meta/IG/TikTok preferred).

* Strong proficiency in Photoshop, Illustrator, Canva, or Figma.

* Demonstrated experience using AI tools in creative production (Midjourney, Firefly, Runway, Canva AI, ChatGPT, etc.).

* Strong understanding of conversion-focused ad design principles and A/B testing.

* Ability to balance creative intuition with performance data.

* Comfortable working in a fast-paced, metrics-driven environment.





Salary

$1100 - $1600 per month based on experience



This is a performance-driven role with clear room for growth as output and campaign performance improve. Compensation is based on results and impact — not hours on the clock.

title: Google Ads Strategist & Video Trainer
description:
Type: Independent Contractor

Working Hours: CET Business Hours (Germany), Monday to Friday

Client Location: Munich, Germany



About the Client:

A high-performance marketing agency based in Munich, Germany. They help ambitious e-commerce brands scale to 7- and 8-figure revenues in the DACH market (Germany, Austria, Switzerland). The focus is simple: data-driven Google Ads strategies that deliver measurable results — while also building strong internal knowledge and systems.



About the Role:

We’re looking for a Senior Google Ads Media Buyer who is not just strong in execution, but also highly confident on camera. This is a hands-on performance role. You will personally plan, launch, and optimize Google Ads campaigns for e-commerce brands. However, a key part of your responsibility will be recording structured Loom videos explaining:



- Campaign setups

- Strategy decisions

- Optimization processes

- Performance analysis

- Scaling frameworks



These videos will serve as internal training resources and strategic documentation. If you are someone who enjoys explaining strategy, teaching others, and confidently speaking on camera — this role is for you.



Core Responsibilities:

- Plan, build, and optimize Google Ads campaigns (Search, Shopping, Performance Max) for e-commerce brands.

- Run and manage German-language campaigns (AI translation tools can be used).

- Analyze performance data and rapidly test, iterate, and scale.

- Record clear, structured Loom videos explaining your strategy and optimizations.

- Contribute to campaign playbooks and internal best practices.

- Focus on measurable performance results (ROAS, MER, CPA, contribution margin).



You’re a Strong Fit If You:

- Have senior-level experience managing e-commerce Google Ads accounts.

- Have handled high ad spend accounts.

- Can confidently speak on camera with a professional presence.

- Can explain complex strategies in a simple, structured way.

- Think like a performance marketer (data-first, testing-focused).

- Are proactive, solutions-oriented, and independent.

- Have experience with international or multi-language campaigns (a plus).



Technical & Setup Requirements:

- Strong Google Ads expertise (Search, Shopping, Performance Max).

- Experience with e-commerce tracking and conversion optimization.

- Clear English communication (spoken and written).

- Good microphone and professional video setup for Loom recordings.

- Stable, high-speed internet connection.



How to Apply:



Send the following to 



1. Your updated resume



2. A short Loom video (1–3 minutes) explaining ONE of the following:

- How you would structure a Google Ads account for an e-commerce brand

- OR how you scale a profitable Google Ads campaign

- OR how you approach optimizing a struggling e-commerce account



3. Your asking rate (monthly)



Applications without a video submission will not be reviewed.

We’re evaluating both your Google Ads expertise and how clearly and confidently you communicate on camera.

title: Customer Support Specialist
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and empathetic Customer Support Specialist to handle complex, high-volume user inquiries and technical issues for our platform. This role goes beyond basic troubleshooting and requires a strong technical mindset, including the use of SQL, APIs, and diagnostic tools to investigate and resolve production issues. You will support non-profit customers, organizers, and donors by triaging unexpected platform behavior, navigating sensitive user situations, and collaborating closely with Engineering and Product teams to ensure timely and effective resolutions. The ideal candidate is analytical, tech-savvy, and compassionate, with the ability to explain complex technical concepts clearly to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.



Key Responsibilities:



Investigate and resolve complex user issues that extend beyond basic troubleshooting using SQL queries, APIs, and internal tools.



Perform technical triage through
 and phone support, analyzing datasets and platform behavior to diagnose root causes.



Manage high-volume support tickets related to accounts, platform functionality, and bank transfer verifications with professionalism and empathy.



Document and investigate “unexpected behavior” within a 45-minute window before escalation.



Write clear, detailed JIRA tickets including API values, console error logs, reproduction steps, and database update tracking.



Collaborate cross-functionally with Engineering and Product teams to escalate bugs, advocate for user needs, and drive issue resolution.



Optimize workflows, documentation, and self-service resources to scale support operations and improve user experience.



Support non-profit customers, organizers, and donors while navigating sensitive and emotionally complex situations.



Troubleshoot software application issues and integrations in real-time using technical tools and diagnostic methods.



Monitor and meet key performance metrics such as CSAT, SLAs, and resolution time targets.



Required Qualifications:



2–5 years of experience in a customer-facing product or technical support role, with a strong focus on troubleshooting technical issues (1–3 years in customer service or help desk environments will also be considered for high-volume support experience).



Proficiency in SQL for data querying, analysis, and root cause investigation.



Hands-on experience working with APIs and understanding technical integrations.



Basic understanding of programming concepts and software application troubleshooting.



Experience with case management and structured issue documentation.



Strong experience with ticketing systems and writing technical reports (e.g., JIRA or similar platforms).



Core Competencies:



Exceptional written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to translate technical concepts for non-technical users.



Advanced problem-solving skills and the ability to independently diagnose and resolve complex issues.



High emotional intelligence and empathy, especially when supporting users facing sensitive or real-life challenges.



Strong organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple high-priority tickets simultaneously.



Tech-savvy and quick to learn new tools, platforms, and internal systems.



Benefits:**

Fully remote:

Salary - $4 per hour X 40 hours per week (salary every Friday)

Opportunities for professional development and growth.

Dynamic and supportive work environment.

Monday to Friday, 9AM - 5PM EST

Job Security and Stability

PTO

Inclusive Culture

Upskilling Opportunities

100% Work-From-Home

Exceptionally Supportive Team

Opportunities for Career Growth

Technical Requirements:

USB Headset with Noise Cancellation feature

Working Webcam

Computer with at least 1.8 GHz processor and at least 4GB RAM

Main Internet Service Speed: at least 25 Mbps cable connection

Backup Internet Service Speed: at least 10 Mbps



Please click the link or fill out the form below to apply:




/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScdmYyC5iwNl6_tX3Xi9s23eRqFXK27Ksu3AzSBqHGg2ZmSUw/viewform

title: Shopify Developer - Landing Page Builder
description:
ALERT: If you have experience with REPLO and Shrine Theme, please include "HAS REPLO and/or SHRINE THEME EXPERIENCE" in your subject line. Applications with this experience will be prioritized. 



How to apply:

1. A link to your resume and portfolio

2. Bullet points of your relevant experience. Include specific tasks you’ve handled related to the key responsibilities.

3. Answer this: Are you comfortable using a time tracker while working from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM (PH time)? - This is not for micromanagement purposes, but to ensure accurate and fair compensation. Some tea
mbers render overtime, and we want to make sure everyone is paid correctly and fairly.



JOB TITLE: Shopify Developer



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

- Page Building: Create, design, and publish high-converting landing pages using Shopify and Replo

- Optimization: Improve existing pages for better performance, conversions, and user experience

- Design Implementation: Translate mockups, wireframes, or briefs into fully functional pages

- Technical Execution: Configure sections, integrations, scripts, and responsive layouts

- Troubleshooting: Identify and fix layout, loading, or responsiveness issues across devices

- Collaboration: Work closely with marketing, design, and development teams to execute campaigns

- Testing: Run A/B tests and implement CRO best practices

- Documentation: Maintain organized records of builds, edits, and version updates



Required Skills and Qualifications:

- 1–2 years experience building pages on Shopify

- Hands-on experience with landing page builders (Replo preferred)

- Strong understanding of layout structure, UX, and conversion principles

- Basic knowledge of HTML/CSS (required)

- Strong attention to detail and visual consistency

- Ability to follow brand guidelines and design systems

- Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills

- Ability to manage multiple builds and deadlines efficiently



Preferred Qualifications:

Experience using Replo

With Shrine theme experience



Why Work With Us?

- Purely remote work

- Stable, long-term career

- Supportive work environment, collaborative, respectful, and growth-focused!

- Weekly pay via Wise



Job Summary:

As a Shopify Developer, your main responsibility is to create and optimize Shopify landing pages that are visually strong, technically sound, and conversion-focused. You’ll play a key role in helping campaigns succeed and ensuring every page delivers a smooth, high-quality user experience.

title: Cold Outreach & Appointment Setter
description:
We are a fast-growing UK web design agency selling subscription-based websites to businesses.



We are looking for a hungry, results-driven appointment setter who knows how to start conversations, handle objections, and book qualified sales calls.



This is NOT a passive VA role.

This is a performance-based sales position.



If you are confident, persuasive, and love hitting targets — keep reading.



?



Your Role



Your job is simple:



• Send cold outreach messages (Instagram,
, LinkedIn &
)

• Start conversations with business owners

• Qualify leads

• Book appointments into our calendar

• Follow up with leads who haven’t replied



You are responsible for hitting weekly booked call targets.



?



Targets & Expectations



• 40 hours per week (Mon–Fri)

• Minimum 1,000+ outreach messages per week

• 20+ qualified booked calls per week

• Daily KPI reporting



We measure performance by:

 • Conversations started

 • Appointments booked

 • Show-up rate



If you love working toward clear targets, you will do very well here.



?



Compensation



• Fixed hourly rate

• Performance bonuses per qualified show-up

• Opportunity for promotion to Senior Setter / Team Lead



High performers will earn more.



?



Required Skills



• Strong written English

• Confident communicating with business owners

• Experience with cold outreach or lead generation

• Not afraid of rejection

• Organized and consistent



Bonus:

• Experience booking appointments for agencies

• CRM experience

• UK or US market experience



?



Who This Is NOT For



? If you need constant supervision

? If you don’t like targets

? If you avoid rejection

? If you just want a “stable job”



We want someone competitive and growth-focused.



?



How To Apply



To apply, include:

 1. The word “Setter” in the first line of your application

 2. A short voice recording introducing yourself

 3. Your previous results (appointments booked per week)

 4. Why you think you would succeed in cold outreach



Applications without these will not be reviewed.

title: Onboarding & Operations Manager (m/f/d) – Social Media Agency
description:
We are an internationally operating agency that combines innovation and creativity to dominate the social media landscape. As we are scaling fast, we need a structured and communicative leader to manage the heartbeat of our fulfillment: our team of Virtual Assistants.





IMPORTANT – The Growth Path:

To lead the team effectively, you must master the craft first. Your first month will be a Paid Trial Month where you work as a Social Media Manager/VA yourself. Once you have proven your excellence in daily operations, you will transition into the Management & Onboarding role. (With around 7h per week)





Your Responsibilities:

Month 1: Mastering TikTok account management, daily posting, and engagement tasks.

Month 2+: Managing the end-to-end onboarding of new VAs.



- Full Onboarding: Managing the end-to-end integration of new Social Media Managers/VAs into our workflows.



- Technical Setup: Ensuring all tea
mbers have their dedicated Android devices correctly configured and meet our security/operational standards.



- Quality Control: Monitoring the daily activity, posting schedules, and reporting of the VAs to ensure 100% reliability.



- Team Support: Serving as the first point of contact for troubleshooting and guiding the team to reach their KPIs.



- Process Optimization: Constantly refining our onboarding materials and training manuals to improve efficiency.





Your Profile:

- Leadership Experience: You have experience in managing remote teams or onboarding new employees.



- Structure is your Middle Name: You are highly organized, detail-oriented, and can handle multiple workstreams simultaneously.



- Tech-Savvy: You understand the technical requirements of mobile-based social media management (Android OS, proxies, account security).



- Communication: Excellent English skills (spoken and written) are mandatory to lead our international team.



- Problem-Solver: You don't wait for instructions; you identify bottlenecks and fix them.



- Most important requirement: You own at least one fully functional Android smartphone (Android 10 or higher) that you can use exclusively for this job -> NO PRIVATE PHONES(!)





What We Offer:

- A key position in a fast-growing agency with significant responsibility.



- Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.



- The opportunity to shape the internal structures of a global player.



- A highly motivated, digital-first work environment.





How to Apply:

If you’ve read this far and are ready to lead our team to the next level, please send us a message with the word “System” written backwards in the title and explain your experience in managing or onboarding remote staff.



We are very much looking forward to hearing from you!

TIME WASTERS WITH NO EXPERIENCE WILL BE REPORTED 

RIGHT AWAY AND GET THERE PROFILES REVIEWED

Full-Time | Immediate Start

?

Immediate Start Required



?



Role Overview

This is not basic typing work.



This role requires:

• Extracting correct figures

• Inputting numbers without error

Accuracy is critical. Errors in contract data are not acceptable.



?

?

Background checks will be conducted.



?

title: Operations Manager for Neurodivergence Coach (ADHD + autism + Mental Health)
description:
>> I'm wanting to work with women only (I want to support women!)



I'm a neurodivergence coach originally from Korea, now living in LA. I work with creative, multi-passionate adults who want to build fulfilling lives by working with their nervous system.



My business and life are growing very quickly, and I need an exceptional operations manager / executive assistant—someone in the top 5–10%—to help me take things to the next level.



You'll be my operational partner, making decisions on my behalf and keeping both my business and personal life running smoothly.



I'd love for us to become friends, not just employer-employee. I've experienced this with my previous assistants and it's been really fulfilling.



ABOUT THE ROLE



You'll be acting on my behalf—calling banks, vendors, and service providers, making real-time decisions, and managing personal and business logistics independently.



This is a dynamic, fast-paced and constantly evolving role. Things move quickly without step-by-step instructions, and you'll need exceptional judgment and discretion.



If you love taking initiative, solving problems creatively, and owning projects end-to-end, this could be the perfect role for you.





WHAT YOU'LL BE DOING



- Keep in communication with vendors, service providers—handle situations independently

- Keep track of different dates & deadlines and follow through until completion

- Managing and maintaining multiple projects, tasks and systems

- Conduct in-depth research and troubleshoot issues

- Manage bookkeeping for business and personal finances





WHO WILL THRIVE IN THIS ROLE



- Highly independent and proactive, able to act and d
 on my behalf across personal and business matters

- Exceptional decision-making and sound judgment in a variety of contexts and situations

- Clear, concise, and direct communicator – able to give clear feedback on what is working, what is not, suggestions & improvements

- Adaptable and resourceful, able to navigate new tools, platforms, and situations quickly

- Exceptionally organized and able to prioritize very effectively when many things feel time-sensitive

- Able to own and execute projects from beginning to end

- Comfortable managing complex and multiple priorities without dropping anything (daily tasks PLUS multiple side projects—all at once)





HOURS



- 40 hours/week, Monday–Friday PST (Tuesday–Saturday PH time preferred but weekend time can be adjusted)

- Will meet, do work together, and do dody-doubling (co-working) at 4PM to 9 PM PST (7 or 8 am - 12nn or 1 am)





PAY & BENEFITS



- $1,400–$1,700/month, pay increases as you grow

- Severance pay

- 30 days off per year (flexible)





MY COMMITMENT TO YOU

I treat my teammates with respect and love. We're constantly learning and evolving together. I'm interested in you as a human being, beyond just our work—and I'll compensate you fairly and generously for outstanding work.





DON'T APPLY IF:



- You're early in your career without proven project / operations managing experience

- You struggle with independent decision-making or need guidance on execution

- You feel overwhelmed in high-responsibility, high-autonomy environments

- You're looking for a short-term role or stepping stone

- You feel uncertain or hesitant about this role



>>If this sounds like the job for you, you can read more and apply at the link below


/virtual-assistant

? Ensure funnels are fast, clean, mobile-optimized, and conversion-focused



???? What We’re Looking For

?? Proven experience building funnels for DTC e-commerce brands

?? Strong understanding of CRO, user psychology, and performance marketing

?? Hands-on experience with CheckoutChamp (required)

?? Solid knowledge of tracking & analytics (Meta, GA4, events, conversions)

?? Data-driven mindset - you test, measure, and iterate

?? Independent and reliable - you own your funnels end-to-end

?? Organized, detail-oriented, and deadline-driven



???? Why Join Skinnify?

???? Work Fully Remote – Flexible location and schedule

???? Hyper-Growth Brand – Real scale, real traffic, real impact

???? High Ownership Role – Your work directly affects revenue

???? Performance-Focused Team – Decisions based on data, not opinions

???? Learn & Grow Fast – Work with experienced media buyers and creatives

? Loved by the team: 5/5 rating on Glassdoor





???????? The Skinnify Story

Skinnify was founded to help busy women get fitter without going to the gym.

Our first product - resistance band leggings - turned everyday movement into exercise. Today, we’re building an entire ecosystem of innovative fitness wear.



???? Skinnify’s Core Values

???? Innovation – We rethink what fitness clothing can do

???? Effectiveness – Every product and funnel must perform

???? Accessibility – Fitness for busy, real people

???? Fun – Work should feel energizing, not draining

? Quality – High standards in everything we build

title: Social Media Manager/ Editor (Reels/TikTok)
description:
## Role

Run a vlog-style Instagram account first, then gradually support business-related short videos.

You’ll handle day-to-day planning/editing/posting while we provide direction, references, and final approval.



## Core tasks

- Weekly content plan (simple calendar + hooks).

- Benchmark research: find strong reels, explain why they work, propose adaptations.

- Short-form editing (9:16): clean cuts, pacing, captions/subtitles, basic motion/zoom, audio leveling.

- Posting + light ops: upload, captions if needed, basic performance notes.





##Benchmark channels






(korean business)







## Screening questions (answer all).

You don’t need to have every skill for the questions below—if you don’t know something, that’s totally fine. But please answer honestly.





1) Portfolio (3–5 links): For each link, write what your role was(planning / editing / posting).



2) Editing tools + level: CapCut/Premiere/AE/etc. + your level (Beginner/Intermediate/Advanced) with portofolio



3) Editing workflow: Your step-by-step process when you receive raw clips. Do you use any additional tools? Can you edit the videos like reference videos?



4) Do you have experience with warming up accounts? If you have share me the accounts.



6) Virality knowledge: Have you studied how to make short videos go viral (hooks, retention, rewatch, shares)? Briefly explain + share 1 example analysis.



7) AI usage: Rate 0–10 and list what you use AI for (ideas, scripts, hooks, captions, subtitles, translation, etc.).



8) AI experience: Share 1 real example (what you generated + how you edited it before posting).



9) Automation tools: Have you used Claude Code, n8n, Zapier, or Make? If yes, what did you build (one sentence each).



10) K-pop familiarity: Rate 0–10 + 2–3 examples of K-pop-related content you edited/managed (links if possible).



11) Skin retouch editing: Have you done skin-tone correction / skin cleanup (beauty retouch)? Tools used + 1–2 examples (or exact steps).



12) Website (one sentence): Can you design and publish a simple landing page? If yes, what tools/stack?



13) if your face is later blurred or you wear a ski mask, are you open to film and appear in the videos?(This is just a question, not mandatory)



14) Have you used heygen or ai generated tools?

title: Accounts Preparation Specialist (UK Statutory Accounts)
description:
Accounts Preparation Specialist (UK Statutory Accounts)

Full-Time | UK Hours | Remote | ?55,000–?70,000 per month

We are a growing UK firm of accountants supporting hundreds of businesses across multiple industries. We are expanding our team and looking for a highly skilled Accounts Preparation Specialist with solid UK accounting experience.

This role is focused on year-end statutory accounts preparation.



**** Important: This is NOT a bookkeeping role. ****

If your experience is limited to transaction posting, bank reconciliation, or day-to-day bookkeeping only, this position will not be suitable.



We are looking for someone confident in handling full year-end files, reconciliations, journals, VAT schedules, and statutory draft accounts for UK clients.

________________________________________

What You’ll Be Doing

You will manage multiple UK client files each month and work closely with UK-based managers during file reviews and handovers.

Your responsibilities will include:

• Preparing year-end statutory accounts for UK clients (Xero required; Sage or QuickBooks is a plus)

• Producing complete and well-structured Excel working papers to support reconciliations

• Posting and reviewing journals (accruals, prepayments, depreciation, reclassifications)

• Reviewing and adjusting Profit & Loss accounts

• Preparing loan calculations and posting interest journals

• Performing VAT reconciliations (experience preparing UK VAT returns is advantageous)

• Supporting PAYE and payroll reconciliations

• Preparing audit-ready supporting schedules

• Liaising with UK accountants and external auditors to resolve queries

• Preparing management accounts when required

This role requires accuracy, accountability, and confidence working with UK accounting standards.

________________________________________

Who We’re Looking For

You must meet the following criteria:

• ? Proven experience preparing UK statutory year-end accounts (not bookkeeping only)

• ? Minimum 3 years accounting experience with exposure to UK clients

• ? Strong understanding of accruals, VAT, PAYE, reconciliations, and statutory reporting

• ? Xero experience (required)

• ? Strong Excel skills (pivot tables, VLOOKUP/XLOOKUP, variance analysis)

• ? Ability to manage multiple client files efficiently

• ? Excellent English communication skills

• ? Reliable internet connection and professional home office setup

Experience with Dext and Hubdoc is an advantage.

________________________________________

Compensation & Benefits

• ?55,000–?70,000 per month (based on experience)

• HMO after 3 months

• 13th Month Pay

• Paid Philippine Holidays

• Permanent UK business hours

________________________________________

Application Instructions (Important)

To be considered, please apply using 5 Apply Points and submit:

1. Updated resume

2. Cover letter outlining your UK accounts preparation experience

3. A short video confirming that you meet each of the listed requirements



Applications without UK statutory accounts preparation experience will not be shortlisted.

If you are confident preparing UK year-end files independently and want to work with a professional UK accounting firm long term, we’d love to hear from you.

title: LinkedIn & Email SDR / Appointment Setter (Philippines – Full Time, UK Agency)
description:
S4 Digital is a UK-based marketing agency that helps EV, electrical and energy service businesses generate predictable leads using content, ads and simple systems.

We are looking for a proactive LinkedIn &
 SDR / Appointment Setter to own our outbound lead generation. Your main goal is to start conversations with the right businesses and book qualified calls into the founder’s calendar. You will be working directly with the founder and our small remote team.

Responsibilities



Build targeted prospect lists (EV charging installers, electrical contractors, renewable/energy service businesses in the UK).



Send 10–30 personalised LinkedIn connection requests per day from the founder’s profile (no spam, quality over quantity).



Send simple follow-up messages to start conversations about how they currently get leads.



Reply to basic LinkedIn messages using agreed scripts.



Qualify interested prospects with a short list of questions.



Book qualified calls directly into the founder’s calendar (UK timezone) and confirm attendance.



Log and tag every lead in our CRM (GoHighLevel) and keep the pipeline updated.



Track daily numbers: connection requests, replies, conversations started, calls booked.



(Nice to have) Help send simple cold
 campaigns from templates.



Requirements:



1+ year experience in LinkedIn lead generation, appointment setting or SDR work (B2B).



Strong written English (friendly, clear, professional).



Very organised and comfortable using CRMs and spreadsheets.



Able to work at least 3–4 hours overlapping UK business hours.



Stable internet, quiet environment and reliable computer.



Nice to have:



Experience with GoHighLevel, HubSpot, Pipedrive or similar.



Experience with agencies, construction, electrical, EV or energy sectors.



What we offer:



Full-time, long-term role (40 hours/week).



Competitive salary in PHP + performance bonuses for qualified show-up calls and closed clients.



Direct work with the founder, clear systems and feedback.



Remote, work-from-home, flexible within agreed hours.



How to apply:



Brief intro about you and your SDR / lead gen experience.



1–2 examples of campaigns you’ve worked on.



Your expected monthly salary in PHP for full-time work.



A short Loom (2–3 mins) explaining how you would find and contact EV installers in the UK on LinkedIn.



Use the subject line: “SDR Application – [Your Name]”.

title: Customer Engagement Assistant (Chat Support – Remote)
description:
We are hiring a full-time Sales Chat Assistant to help build relationships with potential customers via online chat.



Your primary responsibility will be to communicate with leads and interested customers, build trust, and guide conversations toward sales in a natural, human way. This is not scripted customer support — this is relationship-based communication focused on engagement and conversion.



You will be working with warm leads who have already shown interest. Your job is to maintain conversations, build emotional connection, and help convert interest into purchases.



Responsibilities:



• Chat with potential customers and respond quickly

• Build trust and maintain ongoing conversations

• Develop relationships that lead to sales

• Follow clear communication guidelines and frameworks

• Keep conversations organised and consistent

• Meet daily activity and performance targets



This role is ideal for someone who:



• Has excellent written English

• Is persuasive and emotionally intelligent

• Understands human psychology and communication

• Is reliable, disciplined, and consistent

• Is comfortable working toward performance targets



This is a long-term role with stable hours. Top performers can quickly increase their income and move into higher-level positions.



Full training is provided.



$2.5 p/h + commission. Our top sales people earn $1200 per month

title: eCommerce Growth Manager
description:
Own Category Growth, Optimize Performance, and Expand Market Dominance.



Hadley Designs is seeking a Growth Manager to take full ownership of a multi-million dollar product category, with Amazon as the primary growth channel. This is a high-impact role for a results-driven e-commerce operator who thrives on ownership, accountability, and driving measurable growth through disciplined execution and data-backed decision-making.



While this role operates deeply within Amazon, we welcome candidates who have driven growth across e-commerce, DTC, or marketplace environments and are excited to apply that experience within a scaled Amazon ecosystem.



How You’ll Win at Hadley Designs:

We believe performance comes from strong systems executed consistently.



Every eCommerce Growth Manager is expected to progress through three stages:



- Learn the Playbook – Understand our category strategy, operating standards, and decision frameworks

- Apply the Playbook – Execute accurately and consistently to deliver predictable, scalable results

- Enhance the Playbook – Improve systems with new ideas and strategies after mastery is demonstrated



This order matters. We value innovation, but only when it is grounded in proven execution. Our playbook exists to help high performers win faster, create leverage, and scale impact — not slow them down.



To formally apply, apply HERE:

title: Project-Based Technical Recruiter (Per Placement | Remote | On-Demand)
description:
About Us



We are a growing business support firm partnering with both local and international clients across cybersecurity, SaaS, and other technical industries, while also supporting non-technical business operations such as administrative, support, and back-office functions.



As we secure new client engagements, we require a reliable recruitment partner who can step in to source and assess high-quality talent across both technical and non-technical roles in a timely and professional manner.



This is not a full-time position.

This is a project-based, on-demand partnership.



Role Overview



We are looking for an experienced recruiter who can:



Source and screen technical candidates (e.g., Technical Project Managers, Network Engineers, Cybersecurity roles)

Assess technical fundamentals beyond resume keyword matching

Handle non-technical roles (admin, support, operations, etc.)

Conduct structured and consistent screening interviews

Deliver 3–5 high-quality shortlisted candidates per role

Provide clear candidate summaries and screening notes

Support the process through successful placement



Ideal Candidate



Minimum 2 years of recruiting experience (technical recruiting required)

Proven ability to screen IT / cybersecurity roles

Strong written and spoken English

Able to evaluate both technical capability and cultural fit

Organized, process-driven, and deadline-oriented

Understands client-facing quality expectations



Preferred:



Agency or placement-based recruitment experience

Experience working in performance-based compensation models



Compensation



This is a project-based, performance-driven engagement.



Compensation structure will be discussed during the interview stage and aligned based on role complexity and scope.



We operate on a hybrid model that includes:



An engagement component

A success-based placement fee

Full details will be shared with shortlisted applicants.



In your application, briefly explain how you normally structure your recruitment compensation (hourly, retainer, per hire, hybrid).



Why This Role Is Ideal



Flexible workload

Engagement only when roles are active

Competitive earnings per completed hire

Long-term partnership opportunity as we scale

title: Web Designer/Web Developer for growing agency
description:
About Us

We’re a growing digital marketing agency that helps local businesses stand out online through smart strategy, SEO, and beautiful web design. Our websites are built to perform — and we’re looking for a driven Web Developer who’s eager to learn, take ownership, and grow with us.



About the Role

We’re looking for a WordPress Web Developer who will be responsible for building, maintaining, and optimising websites for our clients. You’ll work closely with our marketing and design team to bring creative ideas to life and ensure each site is fast, functional, and conversion-focused.



We’re open to junior or mid-level candidates — if you have the right attitude, we’ll train you. We’ll invest time and resources into your development, including access to online courses and mentorship to upskill in WordPress, SEO, UX, and performance optimisation.



Key Responsibilities:

Develop and maintain WordPress websites using themes, builders (Elementor), and custom code when required.

Implement on-page SEO best practices (meta tags, site speed, schema, etc.).

Manage website updates, backups, and hosting tasks.

Collaborate with designers and marketers to bring concepts to life.

Troubleshoot issues and ensure all websites are mobile-optimised and user-friendly.

Maintain documentation and manage project timelines.



What We’re Looking For:

Strong understanding of WordPress, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP (basic to intermediate).

Experience with page builders and plugins like Elementor, WPForms, RankMath/Yoast, and ACF.

Familiarity with website optimisation and responsive design.

A problem-solving mindset and attention to detail.

Willingness to learn, take feedback, and grow within the role.



Bonus Skills (Not Essential)

Experience with WooCommerce.

Familiarity with hosting, cPanel, and DNS management.

Understanding of Google Analytics, Tag Manager, and SEO fundamentals.



Why Join Us:

We’ll train and invest time in you — your growth is our priority.

You’ll have direct mentorship and access to premium courses and education tools.

Flexible work hours and a supportive, collaborative environment.

Opportunity to work on real projects that make an impact.



Please start your application with 'Cool Jellybeans' at the top of your message.



Look forward to hearing from you.



Cheers,

Mitch

title: ELECTRICAL/SOLAR ENGINEERS! VIRTUAL SOLAR TECH SUPPORT
description:

Founded in 2005, RICH SOLAR is the leading supplier of off-grid solar equipment for RV, agriculture, off-grid housing, marine, light industrial and heavy equipment, provides solar panels and other equipment, including solar charge controllers, inverters, batteries and complete do-it-yourself solar kits.



We are seeking for an experienced Virtual Solar Tech that is hardworking and knowledgeable of the industry.

• Work with upper management in finding new solar products

• Prepare necessary reports





WHAT YOU WILL BRING ALONG:

title: B2C/B2B Web3 Customer Support Specialist
description:
B2C/B2B Web3 Customer Support Specialist

Full-Time

$600 / month

$800 after 3 months



About Us

Trustyfy is a global technology company building the first DeFi bank for companies and individuals.

For the first time since the invention of modern banking, customers, not banks, can have full ownership of their money.

Through our proprietary multi-signature and decentralized infrastructure, businesses can operate globally without payment delays and at a fraction of the cost of legacy banking systems. Workers can remit funds to their families with minimal fees, and billions of unbanked individuals gain access to financial independence.

We are not just building the future of finance. We are building technology that creates real-world impact.

Our vision is validated through strong recurring revenue and a successful seed round, and we are now scaling our global team to support the next phase of growth.

Why Your Role Matters

As a B2B Web3 Customer Support Specialist, you will help business clients confidently navigate crypto transactions and blockchain workflows. Your ability to combine excellent customer service with technical accuracy will ensure clients can securely send, receive, and verify digital funds while trusting Trustyfy’s infrastructure.

Key Responsibilities

Provide exceptional support to users and business clients via
, chat, and phone, ensuring prompt and accurate issue resolution.





Educate and guide users on interacting with decentralized applications (DApps) and using crypto wallets securely, including tools such as MetaMask.





Assist clients with sending, receiving, and verifying crypto transactions, including transaction validation using explorers such as Etherscan.





Troubleshoot issues related to blockchain networks, wallet integrations, and decentralized applications.





Collaborate with technical and product teams to escalate and resolve complex cases.





Maintain accurate records of customer interactions, technical concerns, and service recommendations.

Skills and Experience

Experience: Minimum of 2 years in customer service, technical support, or client success, ideally within fintech, Web3, or blockchain environments.





Technical Knowledge: Familiarity with crypto wallets, blockchain transactions, and DApps. Ability to quickly learn and adapt to new Web3 tools.





Customer Service Skills: Strong communication, empathy, and client-focused problem-solving abilities.





Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication with the ability to simplify complex technical concepts.





Problem Solving: Strong troubleshooting and analytical thinking skills with high attention to detail.





Work Ethic: Highly reliable, self-motivated, and capable of working independently in a remote environment.





Availability: 

Schedule Options: UK, US or AUS timezones

Must be open to working on weekends

40 hours per week, 5 working days



Salary

YOUR PAYMENT IS FIXED AND GUARANTEED. This means you will be paid even if workload temporarily fluctuates (although consistent workload is expected).



To apply for this position, please write in the subject line:

“I am a B2B Crypto Customer Support Specialist [Name + Surname]”

title: SEO & Content Specialist for growing Agency
description:
About Us

We’re a growing digital marketing agency passionate about helping local businesses grow through smart, sustainable strategies. We’re now looking for a full-time SEO & Content Specialist who’s ready to take ownership of all things SEO—from strategy and optimization to content creation and performance tracking.



About the Role

As our SEO & Content Specialist, you’ll manage and execute SEO campaigns for a range of clients across different industries. You’ll be responsible for ensuring every website we manage performs at its best—technically, strategically, and creatively.



You’ll have the freedom to own your work while being supported with ongoing training, resources, and mentoring.



What You’ll Be Doing:

Take full ownership of SEO strategy and implementation for client websites

Conduct keyword research, competitor analysis, and content gap analysis

Optimise on-page elements (titles, metadata, internal linking, etc.)

Develop and brief SEO-focused content strategies and blogs

Monitor rankings, performance, and analytics using tools like Google Search Console, Analytics, and Ahrefs/SEMrush

Identify and implement opportunities for technical SEO improvements

Prepare monthly performance reports and insights

Collaborate with designers, developers, and copywriters to improve site performance and UX



What We’re Looking For

1–3 years of hands-on SEO experience (agency or freelance)

Strong understanding of keyword research, on-page optimisation, and link building

Excellent writing and editing skills (SEO content writing experience preferred)

Comfortable using Google Analytics, Search Console, and keyword research tools

Proactive, curious, and ready to take initiative

Strong communication skills and attention to detail



What You’ll Get:

Direct mentorship and hands-on training — I’ll personally invest time in your development

Course access and professional upskilling — we’ll fund SEO and content training programs to help you grow

Autonomy and ownership — you’ll have the freedom to run campaigns and take real responsibility for results

Long-term growth opportunity — this is a full-time, ongoing position with room to advance



Please start your application with 'Cool Jellybeans' at the top of your message.



Look forward to hearing from you.



Cheers,

Mitch

title: Hiring experienced editor for youtube business

title: Join a Purpose-Driven Aussie Team as a Student Success Coach – Work From Home | Long-Term Opportunity |
description:
Are you passionate about helping others succeed? Do you thrive in a role that blends tech, communication, and heart? We’re the Australian Institute of Flexible Learning (AIFL) – a warm, family-oriented team run by healthcare and education professionals, and we’re on the lookout for our next Student Success Coach based in the Philippines



We’re growing – and we need someone reliable, loyal, tech-savvy, and drama-free who wants to grow with us.



What You'll Be Doing:



-Making follow-up calls to potential students and partner organisations

-Cold calling prospective students and organisations when required

-Managing leads in HubSpot CRM

-Generating leads and following up warm enquiries

-Answering inbound calls with warmth and professionalism

-Supporting enrolments and course inquiries accurately and efficiently

-Using tools like Microsoft Office, Canva, and AI tools to improve workflows

-Helping us enhance systems and services with your initiative and insights

-Supporting students through their journey 

- If you have more technical skills like AI agents, improving documents and presentations then we can discuss that too 



We’re Looking For Someone Who:



-Is a lead generation specialist who knows how to attract and convert interest

-Has experience in the Australian education or healthcare/VET sector (ideal, but not essential)

-Can work independently and as part of a supportive team

-Has a professional voice and speaks excellent English with strong written and verbal communication

-Values honesty, hard work, and trust

-Has great English communication skills and a friendly phone manner

-Is tech-savvy, proactive, and organised

-Has backup power and internet

-Is looking for a long-term role with growth potential

-Doesn’t gossip, make excuses, or wait to be told what to do — you just get things done



Perks:



Remote work from home

Flexible hours (Aussie time zone- no graveyard shifts!)

Part-time to start – potential to go full-time for the right fit

$5.50 AUD/hour

Supportive management who genuinely care

You'll be part of something meaningful – changing lives through education!



 If you're someone who wants to work with a real team, be appreciated for your loyalty and results, and grow with an ethical, people-first education provider — apply now.



Send your application through OnlineJobs.ph with your resume, a short intro video (if you like), and your availability. I do interviews via teams.



Let’s do great work together!

– AIFL Team
