title: Product Manager
description:
We are seeking a Product Manager that will assist with the product portfolio of a new food and beverage manufacturing operation in the Philippines, processing agriculture-sourced raw materials into finished food products. This role involves practical tasks combining consumer-goods product management with Philippine food manufacturing realities, including margins, regulations, supply-chain changes, and price considerations. The position supports the definition, launch, and growth of SKUs from concept to retail while contributing to volume, margin, and timeline goals. This is a collaborative role, similar to supporting a Product Line Manager.





Responsibilities



1. Assist with the product roadmap from raw-material selection to finished goods, including ideation, feasibility studies, costing, packaging design, shelf-life validation, and launch planning

2. Perform market sizing, competitor benchmarking, channel research (modern trade, general trade, sari-sari stores, foodservice, export), and price-volume modeling; support justification of each SKU with data and a payback period under 9 months

3. Support cross-functional teams (R&D, procurement, production, quality assurance, sales) to help with decisions and timelines

4. Help develop product costing practices covering raw and packaging materials, conversion costs, yield targets, and wastage limits; aim for costs within ±3% of targets or provide explanations

5. Assist in designing and executing consumer testing, sensory panels, and pilot launches in Metro Manila; contribute to trial-to-repeat metrics

6. Help build and maintain sales forecasts (by SKU, by channel, rolling 12 months) with ±10?curacy; support root-cause analysis for deviations

7. Assist in optimizing the portfolio by identifying underperforming SKUs, suggesting reformulations for cost reduction, and supporting supplier contract negotiations when raw-material prices change by more than 5%

8. Contribute to the profit and loss (P&L) for the product line, with gross margin, contribution margin, and EBITDA as performance indicators





Minimum requirements



1. 1-3 years of product management experience in the Philippine FMCG food and beverage sectors (processed meats, snacks, sauces, beverages, dairy, bakery; excluding cosmetics, pharmaceuticals, or durables)

2. Track record of assisting in launching at least 2 SKUs that remain available (references will be checked)

3. Basic Excel modeling skills for product costing, scenario analysis, and yield simulations, with support from finance teams as needed

4. Ability to work with contract manufacturers and support quality standards in the Philippine plants

5. Understanding of sachet economics, trade margins, promotional ROI, and common reasons for new CPG launches in the Philippines

6. Some experience with agricultural raw-material changes (copra, sugar, corn, cassava, etc.) and basic strategies for handling them

7. Basic knowledge of Filipino/Tagalog for market research and interactions with farmers/cooperatives; good English for reporting

8. Prioritization and decision-making skills in uncertain situations, with references able to validate disciplined scope management and early identification of unviable concepts





Work environment



Full-time position with a minimum of 45 hours per week. Primarily remote or hybrid, with required on-site presence at the plant and in Metro Manila for meetings, trials, and market visits.





Compensation: Competitive compensation commensurate with experience.



Note: You should include these in your application:



- A PDF of your CV shared via URL

- A cover letter shared via URL explaining your relevant experience (generic applications will not be considered)

title: Senior Amazon Catalog Specialist
description:
As the Senior Amazon Catalog Specialist, you will serve as both a technical expert and a strategic partner in managing and optimizing multiple Amazon Seller Central accounts. This role combines hands-on catalog execution with strategic involvement in process improvement, people development, and cross-functional collaboration.

 

You will play a key role in ensuring catalog accuracy, operational efficiency, and overall client success. Beyond technical excellence, this position demands leadership readiness — the ability to guide tea
mbers, support training and upskilling, and work directly with management on strategic planning and scalability initiatives.

 

This role is ideal for someone who thrives in both execution and leadership, capable of functioning as an Individual Contributor, Executor, or Project Manager, depending on team priorities and business needs.



Key Responsibilities:

- Catalog & Operations Management

- Strategic Execution & Cross-functional Collaboration

- Process Improvement & SOP Compliance

- Leadership & People Development

- Client & Account Support



Requirements:

-3+ years of experience managing Amazon Seller Central accounts and complex product catalogs.

-Proven expertise in flat file management, product data structuring, and troubleshooting listing issues.

-Advanced Excel proficiency (VLOOKUP, PivotTables, formulas for data analysis and reconciliation).

-2+ years of leadership, mentorship, or project management experience preferred.

-Strong understanding of FBA & FBM, Amazon policies, and catalog workflows.

-Excellent problem-solving, analytical, and communication skills.

-Experience with ClickUp or other project management tools is a plus.

-Process-driven mindset with strong attention to detail and the ability to multitask across accounts.

title: Senior Brand Designer (Product, Packaging, Retail & Digital)
description:
About: We are Spartan Bicycles (
). Please take a look at our website and our Instagram 
 before applying so you understand our visual style. We are looking for a Creative Lead who can handle both the creative side (making the brand look exciting) and the technical side (ensuring our packaging and presentations are flawless).



The Role: You will be our "Brand Guardian." You will ensure that a Spartan bike looks just as good on a muddy trail (A+ Content) as it does on a retailer's shelf (Packaging).



Key Responsibilities:



Retail & Packaging (Technical):



Designing packaging, manuals, hang-tags etc.



Creating Planograms (shelf mockups) to show major retailers how our products should be displayed.



Crucial: You must be the "last line of defense" for details. You will check warning labels, barcodes, and specs before files go to print.



Experience in working with Disney/Mattel style guides a plus.



Digital Marketing (Creative):



Designing premium Amazon A+ Content and Brand Store layouts.



Creating high-converting ad visuals for Social Media (Meta/Instagram).



Designing the bicycle/scooter/helmets/accessories colorways, decals, artworks.



Building the brand story through cohesive product design.



B2B Presentations (Business):



Building professional PowerPoint Pitch Decks for our sales team.



Creating different decks for different clients (e.g., a "Corporate Fleet" deck vs. a "Kids Bike" deck for a toy store).



General Duties:



Plus any other tasks assigned by the Company to support marketing, sales, or operations as business needs evolve.



Requirements:



Experience: 5+ years in Graphic Design (specifically with Physical Products/Retail).



Software: Expert in Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign, and PowerPoint.



Attention to Detail: You treat a typo on a package as a serious error.



English: Fluent written and spoken English is required.



Terms & Legal:

Intellectual Property: All creative work, source files, designs, and concepts produced during your employment will be the sole property of Spartan Bicycles. You will be required to sign a Work for Hire / IP Waiver agreement upon hiring.



How to Apply (Please follow these steps exactly):



Send an message with the subject line: "Spartan Designer Application - [Mention Your Favorite Font]"



Portfolio: Send a link to your portfolio. Explicitly point out 3 things:

- One example of Packaging/Print work.

- One example of Digital/Web layout (A+ content or Landing Page).

- One example of a Presentation Deck (or a multi-page layout).



In your message, please answer this briefly:

"When designing packaging for a retail product, what is the #1 technical mistake you see other designers make (e.g., regarding colors, text, or layout)?"

title: Remote Role: LMS & Automation Specialist (Moodle, Web, AI & Systems Security)
description:
We are an Australian Registered Training Organisation operating in the health and wellness education sector. We are seeking a highly capable LMS & Automation Specialist to optimise, secure, and elevate our technology environment.

This is not a basic VA role. We are looking for a technically strong systems thinker who can manage our Moodle LMS, strengthen our systems security, improve integrations, and implement automation solutions that reduce manual administration while protecting data integrity.

Key Responsibilities:

• Manage and optimise Moodle (users, enrolments, plugins, reporting)

• Improve website functionality and LMS integration

• Build automation workflows using Zapier or Make

• Implement AI-powered solutions to streamline operations

• Conduct a systems audit and implement efficiency upgrades

• Strengthen cybersecurity posture across LMS, website, and integrations

• Ensure compliance with data protection and access control best practices

Security & Access Requirements:

• The successful candidate may be required to work via a secure remote desktop environment

• Must be comfortable operating within restricted-access systems

• Must follow strict data security protocols and confidentiality standards

• Experience with secure hosting environments, user permissions, and backup management is essential

• Understanding of cybersecurity fundamentals (firewalls, SSL, MFA, access logs, vulnerability mitigation) is highly regarded

Required Experience:

• Proven Moodle administration experience

• Web development capability (HTML/CSS/JS; PHP preferred)

• Zapier or Make automation experience

• API integrations between systems

• Strong troubleshooting capability

• Demonstrated understanding of system security and data protection

Highly Regarded:

• Experience in education or LMS environments

• AI automation experience (ChatGPT/OpenAI integrations)

• CRM integrations

• Experience working in regulated or compliance-driven environments

To Apply:

Please provide:

Examples of Moodle systems you have managed

Automation workflows you have built

Links to systems or websites you have worked on

A short explanation of how you would improve and secure a growing education organisation’s tech stack

This role may begin as a short-term audit project and transition into an ongoing part-time engagement.

We are looking for someone who thinks strategically, builds clean and secure systems, and takes ownership of outcomes.

title: Project Manager
description:
We are seeking a Project Manager that will coordinate and drive execution across multiple venture businesses in a fully remote setup. This role involves proactive communication, independent problem-solving, and keeping fast-moving projects on track without supervision. The Project Manager will act as the operational backbone across ventures, ensuring nothing stalls and everything is accounted for.





Responsibilities



- Own project timelines, deliverables, and accountability across multiple ventures simultaneously

- Communicate proactively with stakeholders by identifying issues early, driving decision-making, and eliminating blockers before they escalate

- Build and maintain clear documentation and processes to keep distributed teams aligned

- Identify risks and inefficiencies independently and act on them without waiting for direction

- Learn and adopt new tools quickly as operational needs evolve

- Support founders and leadership with structured thinking and logical problem-solving on strategic and operational priorities





Qualifications



- 1-3 years of experience in project management, operations, or a similar coordination-heavy role

- Excellent command of the English language, both written and verbal

- First-principles thinker who can break down ambiguity into actionable steps

- Systems thinker with the ability to see how moving parts connect across multiple ventures

- Strong ownership mindset and high agency, comfortable operating with minimal supervision

- Proven reliability and consistent follow-through on commitments

- Able to learn and adapt to new tools and systems quickly and responsibly





Work environment



Fully remote. Must be comfortable working asynchronously across time zones and maintaining clear communication without in-person oversight.







Submit a resume and a concise summary of relevant skills and experience.

title: Student Administration, Marketing & Sales Officer – Join AIFL
description:
The Australian Institute of Flexible Learning (AIFL) is looking for a results-driven Student Administration & Marketing Officer with strong sales experience to join our team. We need someone who is reliable, trustworthy, and proactive — someone who can wear many hats but excel in sales, marketing, and student enrolment.

This role is ideal for a professional who has previously worked with an Australian company (preferably in the RTO or higher education sector) and knows how to convince and guide students to enrol in their chosen course.



Key Responsibilities:

Sales & Enrolment Conversion – engage with leads, follow up, and confidently convince students to enrol by highlighting benefits, pathways, and outcomes.

Lead Generation & Marketing – manage and grow our presence across social media platforms, campaigns, and outreach strategies to attract students and industry partners.

Student Administration – oversee enrolments, send reminders, follow up on enquiries, conduct induction interviews, and liaise with trainers and students.

Data & Reporting – maintain accurate records, ensure compliance, and analyse student and marketing data.

Support & Systems – assist students with logins and navigation of Moodle, HubSpot, and other learning platforms; complete admin forms; ensure a smooth student experience.

SOP & Process Development – contribute to writing and improving Standard Operating Procedures.



Tools & Platforms You’ll Use:

HubSpot CRM (sales & marketing)

aXcelerate (student management)

Moodle (LMS)

Canva & Adobe (design/marketing)

3CX (telephony)

Microsoft Office Suite & Google Workspace

Social media platforms (FB, IG, LinkedIn, YouTube)



Requirements:

Proven sales experience, ideally in education, training, or services.

Ability to confidently convince and close enrolments with professionalism and empathy.

Preferable - Previous experience with an Australian company, preferably in the RTO or higher education sector.

Preferred - Understanding of RTO operations and higher education in Australia.

Reliable high-speed internet (with backup), dual monitors preferred.

Noise-cancelling headphones and a distraction-free home workspace.

Strong accuracy, attention to detail, and ability to think independently.

Values of loyalty, integrity, respect, responsibility, and reliability.



Application Requirements

Please include:

CV and portfolio

A short voice or video introduction

Internet speed test results

Confirmation of your home office setup (dual screens preferred)



Pay & Hours

Pay: AUD $5/hr 

Hours: flexible, not full-time initially (potential to increase)

Extra points for being available 2 hours on Saturdays



Data Privacy Commitment

You’ll be working with sensitive student and business data. AIFL requires strict confidentiality and the highest standards of privacy and security.



If you are a sales-driven professional with the ability to convert leads into student enrolments while excelling in administration, marketing, and support — we want you on our team!

title: Ecommerce Forecasting Manager
description:
looking for an experienced Inventory Forecasting & Supply Planning Specialist to manage demand planning and inventory replenishment.



This role is responsible for accurately forecasting product demand, determining optimal order quantities, and timing inventory purchases to prevent stockouts or overstock—especially across seasonal demand cycles, bundles, and promotions.



Key Responsibilities



Forecast demand using historical sales data, seasonality, and growth trends



Determine optimal reorder quantities and reorder points for each SKU



Plan inventory ordering based on time of year, sales velocity, and bundles



Account for promotions, launches, and bundle performance in forecasts



Monitor inventory levels and proactively recommend reorder timing



Collaborate with our operations and marketing teams to align inventory with campaigns



Build or maintain forecasting models (Excel, Sheets, or forecasting software)

title: Part-Time UK Bookkeeper – Remote (4 Hours/Week)
description:
Part-Time UK Bookkeeper – Remote (4 Hours/Week)



About Us

We're a small UK-based group running a few businesses across energy and recruitment. Nothing overly complex — we just need someone solid to keep the books tidy on a regular basis.

The Role

We need a UK bookkeeper who knows their way around Xero to jump on for 4 hours a week across two fixed sessions.

Schedule

Every Tuesday & Thursday



6:30 – 7:00 AM UK time: Log in, reconcile transactions, review bank feeds, and prep a quick update

7:00 – 7:30 AM UK time: Jump on our team call to walk us through where things are at

7:30 – 8:30 AM UK time: Clear any follow-ups — posting journals, chasing receipts, tidying up records



That's 2 hours per session, twice a week. 16 hours a month total.

What You'll Be Doing



Bank reconciliation across a few accounts

Categorising and coding transactions properly

Reconciling invoices and keeping the purchase ledger clean

Flagging anything that looks off before it becomes a problem

Prepping bits for our accountant ahead of VAT returns and year-end

Keeping expenses, receipts, and director loan entries in order



What We Need



UK-based and familiar with how UK bookkeeping works (VAT, HMRC, the usual)

Confident in Xero — this is where everything lives

Happy to be on camera for a 30-min call twice a week

Reliable with the early starts — 6:30 AM UK time, no exceptions

Proactive — if something's wrong, flag it, don't wait to be asked



Nice to Have



Experience with Dext or similar receipt capture tools

Background working with small/owner-managed businesses

Comfortable with multi-entity setups



To Apply

Keep it simple — tell us:



Your experience with Xero and UK bookkeeping

Confirm the Tuesday/Thursday 6:30 AM starts work for you

A quick line on the types of businesses you've looked after

title: Senior Bookkeeper *Superstar Only*
description:
We are looking for two experienced bookkeepers to join our finance team and take ownership of expense categorization, transaction reconciliation, accounts payable, and invoice processing across multiple legal entities.



The bookkeepers will work closely with the CFO, ensuring that all financial transactions are accurately recorded, categorized, and reconciled on a regular basis. This role is ideal for someone who is detail-oriented, organized, and comfortable managing financial data across multiple platforms — including Xero, Stripe, PayPal, Shopify, and our custom CRM.



Key Responsibilities

- Categorize all expenses and transactions in Xero, ensuring accurate classification for reporting and compliance

- Reconcile transactions across multiple payment platforms, including Stripe, PayPal, Shopify, and custom CRM tools

- Manage accounts payable, ensuring all invoices are properly reviewed, recorded, and scheduled for payment

- Assist with invoice processing, ensuring all vendor invoices are accurately documented and match purchase orders where applicable

- Work closely with the CFO to provide up-to-date financial records for monthly, quarterly, and annual reporting

- Ensure all financial data is accurate and properly organized to support compliance across multiple jurisdictions

- Flag discrepancies or unusual transactions for review by the CFO



What We’re Looking For

- At least 5 years of experience in bookkeeping and expense reconciliation

- Strong proficiency in Xero

- Experience working with Stripe, PayPal, Shopify, and custom CRMs

- Strong attention to detail and organizational skills

- Experience handling multi-entity, multi-currency financial data preferred

- Comfortable working in a remote-first environment

- Fluent in English, both written and spoken



Requirements for Effective Remote Work

- Reliable computer or laptop capable of photo and video editing

- Stable high-speed internet connection

- Conducive work environment



Working Schedule

- Full-time opportunity

- Remote work setup (Philippines-based applicants only)



Benefits

- Competitive pay

- Training and growth opportunities

- Opportunity to work with a fast-growing content-driven company



Salary range

- Php 40, 000 - Php 65,000 (based on experience)



Application Instructions

Since this is a long-term position, there will be an in-depth qualification process. If you believe you have what it takes, here is what to do next:



Please go to the link below, review the questions carefully, and share the required information.






If you believe you meet our qualifications and requirements, we encourage you to apply now and become a valuable part of our rapidly expanding company.

title: Junior Video Editor
description:
We're looking for a hungry Video Editor to grow with us. You'll craft short-form documentary stories and travel films from raw footage, mentored by senior editors every step of the way.



Responsibilities:

- Edit short-form documentary and travel story videos focused on food, culture, and travel

- Shape compelling narratives with strong pacing, emotion, and storytelling from raw footage

- Learn and develop your craft under the guidance of senior editors

- Assist with color grading, audio mixing, and basic motion graphics

- Manage and organise footage, project files, and timelines

- Take on creative feedback and continuously improve your work



Requirements:

- Portfolio required — include a showreel or editing examples with your application

- Genuine passion for travel, food, and culture storytelling

- Eagerness to learn, take direction, and grow

- Solid English communication skills (spoken and written)

- DaVinci Resolve experience is a plus, but not required — we care more about your eye for storytelling

- Ability to receive feedback without ego

- Detail-oriented, organised, and reliable

title: Advertising & Marketing - Funnel Creation Marketing Strategy
description:
We are an established Australian jewellery business building a national eCommerce acquisition system around a custom Engagement Ring Builder.



We are seeking a senior-level Digital Marketing & Funnel Architect to design, implement, document, and optimise the entire digital acquisition system from the ground up.



This is a full-time, project-based build role.

This is not a basic VA position.



BUSINESS ENVIRONMENT



• Shopify-based website (multiple apps & API integrations)

• Custom-built Shopify ring builder application

• API integration with jewellery-specific POS/CRM (Retail Edge)

• Google Analytics 4 installed

• Google Tag Manager installed

• Meta Pixel installed (requires proper configuration & validation)

• National sales focus (not local store traffic)



We are technology-forward and want to build a scalable, measurable acquisition system.



PROJECT OBJECTIVE



To design and implement a paid acquisition system that:



• Drives qualified national traffic

• Captures and nurtures high-intent leads

• Tracks every meaningful event accurately

• Reduces customer acquisition cost over time

• Provides clear visibility into CAC, CPL, ROAS and funnel drop-offs

• Is fully documented and transparent



We are building, testing, measuring and scaling based on data.



SCOPE OF WORK



Funnel Architecture



• Map full customer journey (cold ? warm ? hot ? purchase)

• Design TOF / MOF / BOF campaign structure

• Identify missing touchpoints

• Build retargeting framework

• Produce documented funnel diagrams and SOPs



Meta Ads (Advanced)



Must have strong working knowledge of:



• Meta Business Manager structure

• Pixel configuration & event tracking

• Custom conversions

• Audience building (custom & lookalike)

• Campaign structure & naming conventions

• A/B testing framework

• Budget allocation strategy

• Scaling methodology

• CAC & ROAS optimisation



Google Ads (Search-Focused)



• Campaign structure

• Keyword research (high commercial intent)

• Match types & negative keyword control

• Conversion tracking

• Bidding strategies

• Cost per acquisition optimisation

• ROAS tracking



Tracking & Analytics



• GA4 configuration

• Google Tag Manager

• Accurate event mapping

• Attribution analysis

• Funnel drop-off analysis

• Weekly structured reporting including:



CPC



CPL



Cost per booked consultation



Cost per acquisition



ROAS



Conversion rates at each stage



Documentation & Training



• Document campaign structures

• Document tracking setup

• Create SOPs

• Explain decisions clearly

• Train business owner & staff



We want clarity, not a black-box system.



IDEAL CANDIDATE



• 5+ years hands-on Meta & Google Ads experience

• Experience with mid to high-ticket eCommerce

• Proven ability to reduce CAC over time

• Strong analytical thinking

• Confident communicating strategy to business owners

• Excellent written English



STRUCTURE



• Full-time during build phase

• Project-based engagement

• Generous rate for high-level expertise

• Clear milestones and deliverables



TO APPLY



Please provide:



Example of a full funnel you have built



Example where you reduced customer acquisition cost



Sample reporting dashboard



How you would approach a high-ticket ($4,000+) product funnel



Your project or monthly rate



Confirmation of experience with Meta Ads, Google Ads, GA4 and Tag Manager



We are looking for someone capable of architecting and implementing a scalable acquisition system from the ground up.



— Burrows Jewellers

title: CEBU OFFICE BASED  DISPATCH STAFF/VA/CUSTOMER SUPPORT
description:
We are Hiring!



Looking for CEBU BASED CSRs for an Australian Company that is willing to work in a HOME OFFICE.



We are expanding our Team and we are looking for a candidate that can work and function under pressure, flexible with schedule and prefers daytime shift. At least 1 year customer service experience is preferred but not required



Applicants must reside in Lapu-Lapu/Mactan. Cebu City/Mandaue applicants are welcome if willing to travel to site.



What to expect?



- We will need someone full time and flexible with time schedules and day off



- THIS WILL BE AN OFFICE BASED SETTING



- We are taking live customer calls.



- Salary is very competitive and Pay is every other week.



How can you Qualify?



1. Excellent English Communication skills



2. Great customer service skills and background, 12 months call center experience is preferred but not required



3. Preferably with an accounting background or is willing to be trained for admin/accounts receivables task.



4. Intermediate to advanced navigation skills (we use multiplatform web tools for the daily operations)



5. Good self-management skills and values integrity at work



6. Adaptable and can work in a fast-paced environment



7. Dependable. Due to the complexity and fast paced work environment, you may be asked to render additional hours and be scheduled to work on weekends.



8. Must have your own Laptop at least an i5 or PC and a noise cancelling headset with a second Monitor.

title: DTC Media Buyer
description:
We’re hiring a full-time Media Buyer to own our paid advertising performance across platforms, with a primary focus on Meta 
 & Instagram Ads). This role is full-time and in-house (remote), so please only apply if you’re looking for a long-term permanent position. We're not hiring freelance or agency. 



This role is ideal for someone who is data-driven, detail-oriented, and excited to work closely with creatives to improve ad performance through clear insights and testing.



What You’ll Be Responsible For

- Launch, manage, and optimize ad campaigns primarily on Meta Ads. Support campaigns on Google, TikTok, or other platforms where relevant.

- Plan and execute structured tests (angles, creatives, offers, landing page) to improve cost per acquisition and ROAS.

- Manage budgets, audiences, and campaign structures based on performance

- Analyze ad performance to identify winning and underperforming ads

- Communicate clear performance insights to the creative team

- Participate in brainstorming sessions to improve creatives based on data

- Analyze Shopify sales data to identify scaling opportunities, conversion bottlenecks and product-level performance

- Monitor competitors’ ads, offers, and campaigns to identify gaps or opportunities in our market niche.

- Stay up-to-date with DTC industry trends and platform updates to ensure best practices.

- Providing administrative support, as and when needed to the manager.



Requirements

- Full-time, Monday–Friday (9am–5pm PH time)

- Remote position

- Strong comfort working with numbers and data

- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills; able to interpret data to make informed decisions

- Able to explain performance clearly to non-technical teammates

- Highly organized, self-directed, execution-focused, and able to work independently

- Willing to learn quickly and adapt as the business grows

- No prior media buying experience required, but you must be sharp, analytical, and able to learn fast.



Nice To Have (but not required):

- Experience running Meta Ads

- Experience with Shopify analytics

- Familiarity with Google Ads, TikTok Ads

- Experience in DTC or performance marketing



What We Offer

- Competitive salary

- Performance-based bonuses

- Paid annual leave & public holidays

- Fully remote work

- Training, upskilling, and career growth opportunities

- A team that values ownership, clarity, and results



Application

Please send your application via
 to 
 with the subject line: "DTC Media Buyer – (Your Name)”. Include your OnlineJobsPH profile link and answers to the questions below in numbered format directly in the
 body:

1) Tell us about your most recent job. What did you mainly work on, what were some challenges you faced, and why did you d
 to leave?

2) If you’ve worked in media buying/advertising, tell us about the campaigns you handled, tools you used, your process, and results. If you haven’t, what have you been learning on your own and how would you get competent quickly?

3) Share a time you took initiative or solved a problem in your workplace. It doesn’t have to be a formal leadership role, just something you’re proud of.

4) Please submit as much of your portfolio as possible. Submitting more work will help us make a more informed decision. Work can include anything within DTC e-commerce industry, but ideally aligned to the role you are applying for. If you don’t have DTC experience, submit your best work portfolio. Strong portfolios outside this role may be considered for other roles. 

5) Pick one project from the attached portfolio in question (4) that you are most proud of and answer the questions below. We want to see your ability to clearly explain what you did, your role, your reasoning, and the results of your work. You may optionally pick more than 1 project to highlight additional skills.

- What the project was

- Your specific contribution

- Why you approached it this way

- The results or impact (if any)



Keywords

 ads,
 ads specialist,
 ads manager,
 advertising, meta ads, meta ads specialist, meta ads manager, meta ads buyer, fb ads manager, media buyer,

We’re looking for a talented Video Editor to join our growing design and media team. You’ll edit content for YouTube channels, real estate marketing, and other business brands.

title: Junior Executive Assistant & Digital Coordinator
description:
Porameta is a European "Investment Product Factory." We specialize in sourcing, verifying, and packaging high-value Portuguese businesses (Hotels, Factories, Vineyards) for international investors seeking EU residency (D2 Visa) and wealth preservation.



As we scale our operations in the Philippines, we are looking for a highly organized, tech-savvy, and communicative Junior Executive Assistant & Digital Coordinator to support our Manila leadership team and act as the crucial backup to our Lead Executive Assistant.

This is a dynamic, growth-oriented support role. You will be the operational backbone of the Manila office, assisting with daily administrative tasks, organizing digital assets, and ensuring seamless client communication.



Crucially, you will be cross-trained to step in and manage high-level client relations and executive scheduling whenever the Lead Executive Assistant is unavailable. This is an excellent opportunity for an ambitious professional looking to grow into a senior corporate role within an international firm.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES



1. Administrative & Organizational Support

Assist the Lead Executive Assistant in managing the Managing Partner’s calendar,
s, and daily schedule.

Organize and maintain digital files, client databases (CRM), and confidential investment dossiers.

Coordinate logistics for local events, roadshows, and seminars.

Prepare meeting rooms, take detailed meeting minutes, and track follow-up action items.



2. Client Communications (Backup & Support)

Serve as the secondary point of contact for incoming inquiries 
, WhatsApp, Phone).

Step in confidently to handle client communications, schedule Zoo
etings, and provide basic company introductions when the Lead EA is out of the office or occupied.

Ensure a polite, premium, "private banking" tone in all client interactions.

3. Digital & Tech Coordination

Assist with the execution of digital marketing campaigns and social media posting.

title: Looking for SEO Specialist
description:
We’re a results-driven digital marketing agency helping brands grow through smart, data-backed strategies. We specialise in SEO, Google Ads, Meta Ads, and web design—and now we’re looking for an SEO Specialist who can deliver measurable results to join our remote team.



The Role

You’ll take charge of SEO campaigns, ensuring client websites rank higher, attract the right traffic, and convert visitors into customers. This role is ideal for someone with 2–4 years of SEO experience and a proven track record of improving rankings, organic traffic, and conversions.



What You’ll Do

Conduct keyword research and build SEO strategies aligned with client goals

Optimise on-page elements (titles, meta tags, headings, content)

Perform technical SEO audits (site speed, indexing, errors)

Manage off-page SEO, including link building and citations

Track rankings, traffic, and KPIs using GA4, Search Console, Ahrefs, or SEMrush

Prepare monthly reports with insights and actionable recommendations

Collaborate with content and web teams to apply SEO best practices



What You Bring

2–4 years of SEO experience (agency experience preferred)

Demonstrated results in ranking improvements, traffic growth, or conversion lifts

Strong knowledge of on-page, off-page, and technical SEO

Proficiency with SEO tools (GA4, GSC, Ahrefs, SEMrush, etc.)

Organised, detail-oriented, and proactive

Excellent written and spoken English

Bonus Skills

Shopify or WordPress experience

Local SEO (Google Business Profile optimisation, citations)

Content optimisation or writing background



Why Work With Us

Flexible, supportive remote culture

Growth-focused environment with mentorship opportunities

Work on diverse projects across exciting industries

Your results will be seen, measured, and celebrated



How to Apply

Send us:

Your CV

A short cover letter introducing yourself, highlighting your SEO results, and describing one project you’re proud of (with measurable outcomes)



Your portfolio showcasing SEO projects, reports, or case studies

Please include the word superb in your cover letter to be considered.



Note: This role includes a paid trial task—apply only if you are comfortable with the trial rate posted.

title: Events & Activation Manager
description:
Porameta is a European "Investment Product Factory." We specialize in sourcing, verifying, and packaging high-value Portuguese businesses (Hotels, Factories, Vineyards) for international investors seeking EU residency (D2 Visa) and wealth preservation.



As we rapidly expand our footprint in the Philippines through high-profile mall roadshows and exclusive investor summits, we are looking for a highly capable Events & Activation Manager to lead our on-the-ground physical marketing efforts.

You will be the operational mastermind behind our "Make it in Portugal" roadshows and private investor seminars. Your primary goal is to ensure that every Porameta physical activation looks premium, runs flawlessly, and successfully captures high-net-worth leads.



You will be responsible for end-to-end event logistics, from coordinating with mall administrations (e.g., Estancia Mall, Festival Mall) to managing the on-site staff and ensuring the "Quiet Luxury" aesthetic of our brand is maintained at all times.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES



1. Event Logistics & Operations

Manage end-to-end logistics for mall activations, pop-up lounges, and hotel seminars (ingress, setup, execution, and egress).

Act as the primary liaison with mall administration, hotel banquet teams, and third-party suppliers (booth fabricators, AV technicians, caterers).

Ensure all physical marketing assets (TV screens, iPads, furniture, brochures) are secured, functioning, and perfectly arranged.

2. On-Site Management & Lead Capture

Oversee the daily operations of the event booth/lounge, ensuring the space is always pristine and welcoming.

Manage and train temporary event staff or brand ambassadors on the Porameta pitch and lead capture protocols.

Ensure all walk-in inquiries are properly routed to the digital "Exclusive Access" kiosk or iPad registration forms.

3. Client Engagement (Frontline)

Act as a confident, professional brand representative, greeting potential investors and answering basic inquiries regarding EU residency and business investments.

Identify and pre-qualify serious investors, smoothly transitioning them to the Managing Partner or Lead Executive Assistant for deeper consultations.

title: Go High Level Systems & Automation Contractor (Project-Based)
description:
Go High Level Systems & Automation Contractor (Project-Based)

Mojo Human Performance Institute | Australia



POSITION SUMMARY

We are looking for an experienced Go High Level (GHL) contractor to build and optimise key backend systems inside our CRM.

This is a project-based role focused on implementing clean, practical systems that support our sales process, payment collection, contracts and automation workflows.



You will be responsible for building structured, reliable systems inside Go High Level.

There is strong potential for ongoing project work for the right person.



ABOUT US

Mojo Human Performance Institute we transform how business owners, leaders and high performers think, lead and perform.

Our clients carry real responsibility teams, families, livelihoods and we help them build stronger businesses, better leadership skills, and more fulfilling lives through coaching, programs, and live events.



At Mojo Human Performance Institute, our values form the backbone of our business and guide everything we do. We are results driven and make an empowering impact, we strive for excellence in accountability, purposefulness and communication. Together, we cultivate a culture of learning and growth, where every tea
mber contributes to creating extraordinary outcomes for our clients and the wider community.



We are scaling and require backend systems that are clean, automated and built properly



SCOPE OF WORK (Initial Projects)

We are hiring a Go High Level contractor to complete several backend system builds, including:

1. Sales & Payment Automation Setup

- Build structured sales processing inside GHL

- Set up electronic contracts

- Configure payment plans and deposits

- Build automation workflows triggered by successful payments

- Ensure correct tagging and onboarding sequences



This will apply across multiple products including coaching and course offers.



2. Sales Pipeline & Lead Management Setup

- Build and structure sales pipelines

- Set up lead qualification stages

- Implement tagging and basic nurturing workflows

- Ensure clear tracking and reporting visibility



3. Newsletter & Database Structure

- Set up a structured weekly newsletter system

- Implement tagging and segmentation

- Ensure unsubscribes do not remove contacts from the entire database



WHAT WE'RE LOOKING FOR

You must:

- Have strong experience building inside Go High Level

- Have built payment workflows and automation systems before

- Understand tagging logic and CRM structure

- Be detail-oriented and organised

- Demonstrate a high degree of confidentiality, discretion and data integrity

- Excellent communication skills and high proficiency in English

- Flexible and adaptable to meet the needs of a dynamic work environment.

- Be reliable and able to meet agreed deadlines



Bonus if you:

- Understand sales pipelines and automation logic

- How This Role Works

- Paid per project (rate agreed before commencement)

- Payment via Wise

- Clear scope agreed upfront

- Remote contractor role

- Potential for ongoing project-based work



PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS & COMMITMENTS

- Prolonged periods of sitting at a desk and working on a computer.

- Work based on Adelaide South Australia timezone

- Ensure an excellent and stable internet connection 



REMUNERATION

- Negotiable based on experience



HOW TO APPLY

To apply, please submit:



1. Your resume or portfolio showing relevant Go High Level experience

title: AI Video Editor — Create Viral Health & Wellness Reels
description:
What You Will Be Doing



You will be producing 6-8 short-form videos per day (30-90 seconds each) for health and wellness pages on Instagram and
.



Every morning, you receive fully written, approved scripts via Google Docs. Your job is to turn those scripts into polished, ready-to-post vertical reels using AI tools and CapCut.



You do not write scripts. You do not make creative decisions about content. All of that is done for you. You focus 100% on production, generating the voice, creating the avatar video, producing visuals, and assembling everything in CapCut.



The Two Video Styles You Will Produce:



(1) Style A: Corner Avatar + AI B-Roll

The AI character appears small in the bottom corner of the screen. The rest of the screen is filled with AI-generated B-roll footage that matches what is being said. Captions appear throughout.

Examples of this style: - 
 - 

This is the more common format (~60% of videos).



(2) Style B: Full Avatar + Overlays/Text

The AI character takes up most or all of the screen. Key statistics, quotes, and emphasis text appear as overlays at specific 
nts. Minimal B-roll.

Examples of this style: - 
 - 

This style is used for more personal, authority-building content (~40% of videos).

Each script tells you which style to use and includes exact markers showing where B-roll or overlays should appear.



Tools You Will Use (We Provide Access)

ElevenLabs — Generate the AI voice from script text (we provide the cloned voice)

HeyGen — Upload a static image + voice file to generate a talking avatar video

Nano Banana — Generate high quality static images

Kling 2.6 — Animate Nano Banana images into short B-roll video clips

CapCut (PRO) — Final video assembly: layering avatar, B-roll, overlays, captions, and export

Google Drive — Receive scripts and deliver finished videos

We will train you on the exact workflow for each tool. Previous experience with any of these is a plus (BIG PLUS) but not required — what matters is your ability to learn quickly and follow detailed instructions.



Basic Editing Skills Needed

Cutting dead space from audio files

Adding overlay images and text on screen

Minor effects: dynamic zoom, cropping, transitions

Producing B-roll content from voiceover and footage – being able to digest what is being said and pair the audio with corresponding visuals

Adding accurate captions to video

Attention to timing and pacing



Requirements

-Strong CapCut / video editing skills (you must demonstrate this in the recreate assignments below)

-Excellent English reading comprehension: scripts are detailed and must be followed precisely

-Extremely detail-oriented: the difference between a video that gets 10K views and one that gets 100K views is in the small details (caption accuracy, overlay timing, B-roll transitions, text styling)

-Reliable, fast internet connection

-Available 8 hours per day, 5-6 days per week (you can take days off when needed as long as you are mostly consistent)

-PH timezone or similar

-Can receive payments through PayPal/Wise

-Comfortable learning and using AI tools (we train you, but you should be a fast & eager learner)

-Good at working with a team and taking constructive feedback

-Female candidates strongly preferred, but not 100% necessary



Pay:

-Starting: $400/month

-Performance raise: $500+/month once you are consistently producing high-quality videos at speed

-Big bonuses when content performs well

-Payment: PayPal/Wise, monthly

-This is a long-term position. We are building a content network and need someone who grows with us. There is real room for growth here.



How to Apply — Two Recreate Assignments



To apply, you must complete two recreate assignments so we can evaluate your skills. This replaces a traditional interview — your work speaks for itself.



Assignment 1: Follow the Tutorial

We will send you a training video (5-10 minutes) that shows the complete production process for one video, from reading the script, to generating the voice, to creating the avatar, to assembling everything in CapCut.

Your task: Watch the training video and recreate the exact same video as closely as possible.

This tests your ability to follow precise instructions and pay attention to detail.



Assignment 2: Work Independently

We will send you a rawscript only — no tutorial, no training video, no step-by-step walkthrough.

Your task: Using the same tools, produce the complete video on your own. Use your creative judgment for B-roll prompts, overlay styling, and CapCut assembly.

This tests your ability to think independently and solve problems on your own — which is exactly what you will need to do daily when you receive new scripts.



Assignment Details

We provide temporary access to all tools (ElevenLabs, HeyGen, Kling) for the assignments

You have 36 hours from receiving the materials to complete both assignments

Submit your finished videos via a Google Drive link (make sure you change the sharing settings so we can view them)

Applicants who complete both assignments on time will be strongly considered for the position.

title: HIRING ASAP! Google Media Ads Buyer (Remote & flexible)
description:
Help scale brands. Own performance. Drive real revenue.



GTE is a fast-growing global eCommerce company where great ideas don’t sit in slides — they turn into real, measurable growth. We build and scale online brands across international markets, and our tea
mbers take real ownership, grow fast, and help shape the future of the company.



We’re now looking for a performance-driven Google Ads Media Buyer to help take our main revenue channel to the next level.



Why This Role Matters



Google Ads drives around 90% of our total company revenue. That means your work won’t just “support marketing”, it will directly influence the growth of the entire business.



This role is perfect for someone who loves improving systems, scaling performance, and turning data into smarter decisions. You won’t just manage campaigns, you’ll help evolve the way we run Google Ads.



What You’ll Be Responsible For

- From day one, you’ll have real ownership. Within your first 90 days, success in this role will mean:

- Developing and rolling out a new or significantly improved Google Ads strategy

- Restructuring and optimizing Google Shopping campaigns for stronger scalability and efficiency

- Driving measurable performance improvements, targeting a 20%+ increase in revenue from Google Ads

- Using performance data to continuously refine bidding strategies, campaign structure, and product feed performance

- Your goal is simple: turn ad spend into scalable, profitable growth.



What We’re Looking For

We’re excited to work with someone who:

- Has at least 3 years of hands-on experience in performance marketing or media buying

- Has direct experience running Google Shopping campaigns for large eCommerce catalogs (10,000+ products)

- Has managed high-budget ad accounts ($300K+ per month)

- Is highly proficient in Google Ads, Google Merchant Center, and Google Analytics

- Ideally has experience with Google CSS Labelizer

- Thinks analytically and uses data to drive decisions, not guesswork

- Enjoys testing, optimizing, and uncovering performance opportunities others might miss

- Is comfortable taking full ownership of results and being accountable for revenue impact



Hiring Process

As part of our process, shortlisted candidates will complete a 19-minute Google Ads knowledge assessment. This helps us understand your hands-on expertise before moving forward to the HR interview stage.



Ready to Grow With Us?

If you’re looking for a role where your work matters, your growth is supported, and your impact is visible — we’d love to hear from you.

title: Ecommerce Multimedia Designer (Remote with flexible hours)
description:
Founded in 2018 and headquartered in The Netherlands, GTE is on a mission to build the most efficient global direct-to-consumer infrastructure and become the world’s largest e-commerce company—powered by a collective of successful, scalable brands. By end of 2026, we’re aiming to achieve $500 million in revenue and operate over 50 thriving online stores worldwide.



With a team of 160+ top-tier remote e-commerce professionals across the globe, we blend local brand experiences with cross-border logistics, ensuring every customer feels connected—no matter where they are.



At our core, we value hard work, freedom with responsibility, constant improvement, and a mindset of positivity. We believe in building a high-performance, remote-first culture where honesty, excellence, and creativity drive everything we do—because the future of work is global, and we’re building it together;





We’re on the lookout for a Multimedia Designer to join our expanding team and drive our company’s growth!





The Challenge

We’re looking for a Multimedia Designer who can bring speed, creativity, and AI-driven efficiency to our creative team. This role will support in producing product images, website graphics, and assist with AI video creation. The challenge is to deliver high-quality output quickly, reduce the need for revisions, and leverage AI tools effectively to maximize efficiency.



The Impact

By creating better creatives, you’ll directly help our ads and products sell better. With higher production levels at higher quality, your work will enable our media buyers, site managers, and the wider team to move faster and perform more effectively.







We would love to hear from you if…

- You have hands-on experience creating AI product videos and use AI tools daily with advanced techniques for video and image production.

- You bring strong graphic design skills and can deliver high-quality visuals quickly.

- You’re experienced in video editing (After Effects, CapCut) and AI video prompting (JSON, problem-solving).

- You’re proficient with Flora, Kling AI, and JSON prompting techniques.

- You have a premium version of ChatGPT, Claude, or Perplexity (a plus!).

- You’re AI-obsessed, work independently, and have a sharp eye for detail.

 -You’re comfortable in Figma (Auto Layout, Components, Variants).

- You consistently balance speed with quality of work.

 





System Requirements:

- Windows: i5 13th Gen or above, 16GB RAM or above.

- Mac: M2 or above.





Couple of the notes about the role

- This role is an Independent Contractor position, offering flexibility, autonomy, and the opportunity to manage your own schedule while making a meaningful impact on our operations. 

- You must be able to commit at least 8 hours per day, 40 hours per week.

- We require everybody in the team to use Hubstaff to track hours worked.





If you are excited about the opportunity and feel like you are a good fit, we encourage you to apply today here:

title: Leads Generation VA – Fixed Salary + Bonus | UK Business Hours | Long-Term Role
description:
About the Role



We are a fast-growing UK property maintenance and facilities management company looking for a sharp, organised Lead Generation VA to build and manage our prospect pipeline. You will research, qualify, and warm up leads so our Sales team can focus on closing. This is a research and outreach role — no cold calling required.



What You'll Do



•	Research and build targeted prospect lists (residential block managers, lettings directors, facilities managers)

•	Find and verify decision-maker contact details (name, title, direct phone/email)

•	Send short, personalised first-touch LinkedIn messages or
s to warm prospects before a Sales call

•	Update and maintain the CRM with accurate prospect data and lead status

•	Hand off 'Ready to Call' leads to the Sales VA within agreed timelines

•	Track daily output and report weekly lead numbers



What We're Looking For



•	Experience in lead generation, prospecting, or research (B2B preferred)

•	Comfortable using LinkedIn, 
, or similar prospecting tools

•	Strong attention to detail — accurate data is essential

•	Good written English for short outreach messages

•	Organised, self-motivated, and able to hit daily output targets

•	Reliable internet and available Mon–Fri 

•	Can work during UK business hours (minimum 4-hour overlap required)



What You'll Earn



•	Base: $4.00/hr ($640/mo)

•	Commission: $0.50 per verified lead added to CRM

•	Conversion bonus: $2.00 when your lead books a call | $3.00 when it converts to a survey/meeting

•	Weekly output bonus: $10 (50+ leads) | $20 (80+ leads)

•	On-target monthly earnings: ~$845 | Strong month: ~$950+

•	Paid via Wise / PayPal 



Trial Task



Shortlisted candidates will be given a paid trial task: build a list of 20 verified UK property prospects and write one sample first-touch outreach message. Full details provided at shortlist stage.

mbers and offer a range of benefits, including:

title: TikTok Shop Operations Manager
description:
Own end-to-end TikTok Shop operations for creator storefronts. You will set up shops, manage product catalogs, coordinate fulfillment, ensure policy compliance, and build scalable processes so creators can sell without friction. This role suits a highly organized, proactive operator who loves turning moving parts into clean, reliable systems.



Responsibilities:



Lead onboarding and configuration of new TikTok Shops for creators, ensuring fast, accurate setup.

Manage the full product listing lifecycle: uploads, keywords, creatives, pricing updates, inventory sync, and listing health.

Coordinate order flow between internal fulfillment systems and TikTok Shop; monitor SLAs, troubleshoot shipping and OMS issues, and resolve exceptions.

Maintain platform compliance by mastering TikTok Shop policies, guidelines, rating standards, and best practices.

Partner with Creator Management and DTC Strategy on promos and campaigns; provide operational readiness plans and post-mortems.

Build and maintain SOPs, checklists, and documentation; design scalable processes and automations to reduce errors and manual work.

Track operational KPIs such as listing accuracy, order cycle times, cancellation rate, on-time ship rate, and store rating; surface insights and corrective actions.



Requirements:



2+ years in e-commerce operations, marketplace management, or similar operational role. Direct TikTok Shop experience is a strong plus.

Proven organizational rigor and attention to detail across multi-step workflows and cross-team dependencies.

Strong problem solving skills with the ability to anticipate risks, triage issues, and drive resolutions quickly.

Process builder who documents clearly and improves systems over time.

Excellent written and verbal communication for internal teams and creator partners.

Comfortable working in a fast-paced startup environment with shifting priorities.



Bonus: experience with Shopify, Amazon Seller Central, OMS tools, and basic logistics and fulfillment concepts; familiarity with SQL or workflow automation is helpful.

title: Scroll-Stopping Video Editor
description:
Video Editor & Creative Strategist (Virtual Assistant) – Real Estate Content

About the Role

We're a real estate team looking for a Video Editor VA who is not going to do what everyone else is doing.

If your reel portfolio looks like every other agent's page — generic walk-through clips, the same trending audio slapped on listing photos, cookie-cutter text overlays — this is not the role for you.

We want someone who watches our market, studies what's working (and what's overdone), and brings us original ideas for how to promote our listings and grow our brand on Instagram Reels, TikTok, and YouTube. You'll have creative input here. We're not just looking for someone to execute a checklist — we're looking for someone who will push us to do better content than we even knew we could.

This is a long-term role with real creative ownership for the right person.



What You'll Be Doing

Short-Form Content (Reels & TikTok) — Where We Need You to Think, Not Just Edit

This is where we want your brain, not just your software skills. Before you touch a timeline, we want you asking: What's going to make someone stop scrolling? What haven't people seen yet? What's the freshest way to show this listing?



Develop original concepts and hooks for listing promotions — we don't want recycled formats, we want ideas that feel fresh and specific to each property

Pitch creative directions before editing begins — formats, angles, storytelling approaches

Edit short-form videos (15–60 seconds) with scroll-stopping VFX, animations, sound effects, and text overlays

Hook viewers within the first 1–3 seconds — every single time

Stay ahead of trends so we're using them early, not after they're played out

Flag what's getting oversaturated and steer us away from it

Reference-level style: Learn With Kayo and VFX Creators



Long-Form YouTube Editing, SEO & Posting



Edit YouTube videos (7–15+ minutes) in a clean, polished, and professional style

Add light music, simple graphics and titles, clean transitions, and B-roll where it adds value

Create click-worthy thumbnails that drive impressions to views

Optimize titles, descriptions, and tags using tools like TubeBuddy

Upload and manage the posting schedule

Monitor high-performing real estate YouTube channels for content ideas and scripting inspiration, including:



Las Vegas Olga Moreno

Buying Southern Oregon

Moving to KC





Work with our coach to build an SEO strategy that supports subscriber and watch-time growth



Creative & Strategic Contribution



Proactively bring ideas for video formats, hooks, and editing styles — don't wait to be asked

Recommend ways to repurpose long-form content into short-form clips

Flag performance opportunities and suggest adjustments based on what's working

Take ownership of improving quality and consistency over time





Required Skills & Experience



Strong experience editing both short-form social content and long-form YouTube videos

Advanced proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, and/or Final Cut Pro

Proven hands-on experience with motion graphics, VFX, text animations, and sound design

YouTube SEO experience (titles, descriptions, tags, thumbnails)

Solid understanding of Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube algorithms

Familiarity with AI tools and Canva for thumbnail creation

Sharp storytelling instincts and attention to detail





The Kind of Person We're Looking For

You're creatively restless — you notice when content formats get stale and you're already thinking about what's next. You don't need to be micromanaged. You bring ideas to the table before you're asked. You take feedback well and you're always looking to improve. You're reliable, organized, and easy to communicate with across time zones.



Nice to Have



Experience working in real estate, with creators, or in educational content

Track record of growing a YouTube or short-form channel

Strong sense of visual branding and consistency





How to Apply

title: Scroll-Stopping Video Editor
description:
About Us:

We are a dynamic and growing real estate company committed to delivering engaging, high-quality video content that educates, inspires, and connects with our audience. We focus on platforms like Instagram, TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and long-form YouTube content to build our brand and provide value to our viewers.



We’re looking for a talented and creative Virtual Assistant and Video Editor to join our team and help take our video content strategy to the next level — with a special focus on creating unique, scroll-stopping, attention-grabbing videos that captivate viewers instantly!



Key Responsibilities

Video Content Creation:

Edit highly engaging short-form content for Instagram Reels, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts using scroll-stopping techniques inspired by accounts like Viral VFX — focusing on quick cuts, dynamic motion, fast-paced storytelling, and visually arresting graphics.



• Edit long-form YouTube videos, ensuring polished storytelling, cohesive structure, and professional-quality visuals and audio.

• Repurpose and reformat existing content creatively across different platforms to maximize reach and impact.



Trend Analysis and Recommendations:

• Stay on the pulse of emerging trends, editing techniques, viral effects, and short-form content strategies on Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube.

• Proactively recommend new video ideas, viral trends, and innovative editing styles based on platform analytics and audience behavior.



Scroll-Stopping Techniques:

• Integrate eye-catching visual effects, punchy text overlays, rapid scene transitions, and motion graphics to grab viewers' attention in the first 1–3 seconds.

• Develop hooks and edit sequences designed to stop users from scrolling and to increase watch time and engagement.

• Continuously study and emulate high-performing styles like Viral VFX while adding a creative, brand-appropriate twist.



Brand Consistency:

Ensure all videos are consistent with our brand voice, visual identity, and messaging while still pushing creative boundaries.



Collaboration and Communication:

• Work efficiently with provided raw footage to produce high-impact final edits.

• Communicate effectively and proactively to clarify project details, timelines, and creative direction.



Content Optimization:

• Add captions, trending music, transitions, and visual effects that elevate the production value and improve viewer retention.

• Optimize each video for the nuances of different platforms (e.g., TikTok pacing vs. YouTube Shorts structure).



Project Management:

• Manage and prioritize multiple projects independently, meeting deadlines with minimal supervision.

• Provide clear and consistent updates on project progress and timelines.



Performance Tracking:

Review analytics to measure video success and adjust editing styles and strategies based on audience engagement and performance metrics.



Qualifications and Skills

Experience: Proven experience editing short-form viral content for Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and long-form YouTube videos.



Technical Skills: Proficiency with professional video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, CapCut, or similar). Experience with Asana is a bonus.



Creativity: A strong sense of storytelling, timing, and rhythm, with a knack for crafting scroll-stopping visuals. Sourcing ideas from other industries besides real estate to capture what they’re doing successfully to drive followers, engagement, and business. Be open to learning new techniques and deepening your video editing capabilities. 



Trend Awareness: Passionate about tracking social media and editing trends — particularly viral techniques used by top-performing accounts.



Attention to Detail: Meticulous and quality-obsessed — no sloppy cuts or overlooked errors.



Organization: Excellent time management and the ability to meet deadlines without sacrificing quality.



Communication: Strong, proactive communication skills for remote collaboration.



Bonus Skills (Preferred but Not Required)

• Experience working with real estate, lifestyle, or educational brands.

• Graphic design skills for thumbnails, branded overlays, or custom assets.

• Knowledge of SEO, YouTube keyword optimization, and social media content strategy.

• Familiarity with basic performance analytics and reporting.



What We Offer

• Competitive hourly rate or project-based compensation, working toward full-time position.

• A creative and supportive environment where you’ll have the freedom to innovate within our brand’s voice.

• Opportunities for growth as our brand and platforms expand.



How to Apply

Visit our social sites:









Visit some of our favorite creators to see our inspiration:


 (love the scroll-stopping ideas he uses)


 (though her work is too heavily edited, IMO)


 (I love some of her really creative work and want to copy it like 
, 
, and 
 - her videos are brilliant and I'd love creative help with coming up with ideas like these.)


 (love the clean thumbnails)


 (love her storytelling and her thumbnails)



Submit your application including:



• A brief cover letter explaining why you’re a great fit for this role.

• A portfolio showcasing your best short-form and long-form video editing work, preferably with scroll-stopping examples and unique video editing concepts. 

• Links to any social media accounts or YouTube channels you’ve contributed to.



We are excited to find a creative, innovative, and results-driven tea
mber who can help us create thumb-stopping, binge-worthy video content that expands our impact and builds lasting connections with our audience!

title: Senior Visual Designer |Ecom Graphic UI UX Designer
description:
We're a high-growth digital fashion brand redefining online retail through bold aesthetics and ruthless creative efficiency. We move fast, test constantly, and believe exceptional visual storytelling drives conversion. As we scale across APAC markets, we're looking for a senior creative operator who treats design as a commercial weapon—not just decoration.



The Role

You'll own the entire visual ecosystem of a modern fashion e-commerce operation, from scroll-stopping social assets to high-converting
 campaigns. This isn't an "execution-only" role; you'll architect precision-crafted workflows that let us produce luxury-level creative at startup speed through mastery, not automation.



You'll be responsible for:

Campaign Creative: Conceptualizing and producing visual assets for seasonal drops, sales campaigns, and product launches across Meta, TikTok, Google Ads, and programmatic display. You understand that every pixel must earn its place in the feed.

Retention Design: Designing high-converting
 marketing templates (Klaviyo/Iterable), SMS graphics, and push notification visuals that maintain brand coherence while driving repeat revenue.



Social Velocity: Creating platform-native content (Instagram carousels, TikTok covers, Stories, Reels thumbnails) that respects current fashion aesthetics and platform algorithms. You know the difference between "designed for Instagram" and "repurposed for Instagram."



Digital Experience: Collaborating on website UI updates, landing page designs, and mobile-first merchandising layouts (Figma ? Shopify/Custom headless). You think in conversion funnels, not just grids.

Production Architecture: Building bulletproof design systems, scalable template libraries, and batch-production workflows that allow 50+ unique assets per week without sacrificing craft quality. You obsess over file hygiene, non-destructive editing, and component-based efficiency.



Asset Management: Organizing rigorous file structures, version control, and handoff protocols that allow rapid iteration across multiple markets and languages without chaos.



Who You Are

Non-Negotiables:

5+ years professional experience in digital design, with a portfolio demonstrating fashion, lifestyle, or premium e-commerce work (DTC brand experience strongly preferred). You've shipped campaigns that actually sold product.

Mastery of Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) and Figma at a professional production level—you know shortcuts better than you know your own address and can manipulate complex masking and retouching in your sleep.

Production Craftsman Mindset: Obsessive attention to detail, color accuracy, and typographic precision. You believe that speed comes from mastery and systems, not shortcuts. You've managed high-volume output (40+ unique deliverables weekly) while maintaining luxury-brand standards.



Business-Level English: You can write compelling copy for ad headlines, articulate design rationale to stakeholders using conversion metrics, and catch cultural nuances in Western fashion marketing.



Asia Timezone Ready: You can overlap 11 AM - 7 PM SGT / CST with reliable high-speed internet and your own professional-grade equipment (Mac/PC capable of handling 4K assets, calibrated display, Adobe CC license, etc.).



High-Velocity Temperament: You've thrived in environments with aggressive launch calendars, real-time performance feedback, and same-day turnaround expectations. You don't wait for inspiration—you build disciplined routines that guarantee consistent commercial-grade output.



Compensation & Culture

Competitive salary denominated in USD

Performance bonuses tied to campaign ROI and creative throughput metrics

Remote-first with quarterly team creative summits in major Asian cities

Annual design tool budget and priority access to sample collections



To Apply: Send your portfolio (Behance, personal site, or PDF), your Instagram/TikTok handle if you manage creative accounts, and one sentence describing the most high-pressure creative sprint you've survived.

title: Buyer Assistant Role for Hungry, Driven Talent
description:
Join a Fast-Growing Startup Built for People Who Want More



We’re not looking for “just an assistant.”

We’re looking for hungry people — teammates who want to learn fast, grow fast, and earn more.



If you’re driven, action-oriented, and tired of slow careers with capped salaries, this opportunity is for you.



What You Get (First Things First)



Performance-based salary increases every year

? The better your results, the more you earn. No ceiling.

Extra paid day off during summer

Paid holidays

Employee discounts on the products we sell

Long-term career opportunity for people who deliver results

A startup environment where effort is noticed and rewarded

A company culture that values ambition, growth, and real money

This is not for people looking to coast.

This is for people who want to build skills and income.



Your Role



You’ll work closely with the team on core operations and commercial tasks:



Support daily operations and business activities

Negotiate with suppliers confidently

Use Excel (basic to intermediate level)

Make simple Photoshop edits (titles, minor adjustments)

Use AI tools (ChatGPT, DeepSeek, etc.) to work faster and smarter

Work efficiently with a minimum two-screen setup

Track the price of the concurrent and update all our stores.

Analyze and track all the different prices from different suppliers.



Who We’re Looking For

Organized, reliable, fast learner

Basic Photoshop skills (beginner level is fine)

Comfortable with Excel

Familiar with AI tools (ChatGPT, DeepSeek, etc.)

Hungry mindset  with strong self-discipline— you want to grow, earn more, and push further

Monitor competitor pricing and update pricing across all our stores accordingly.

Analyze and track pricing variations across different suppliers.



No lazy mindset.

Only motivated, driven people.



How to Apply (Important)

Reply only with:
